name: FAR Infrared Bacteria Home 40x160
description_text:
Bacteria Home 40 x 160 is a high-grade filter medium made of mineral rock. The rock is baked under very high temperatures. It is especially effective in a bakki shower, but can also be used in different filters.

The microscopic pores in the rock allow for high concentrations of good bacteria. The bacteria improve the quality of your water and filter out any harmful particles such as nitrate, nitrite, and ammonia.

Additionally, Far Infrared Bacteria Home improves the mineral and redox-values of the water. Simultaneously, the water is oxygenated, more effectively than with for instance bottom drain filters. Bacteria Home improves the quality of your water up to 16 times more effectively than underwater filtration systems.

Thickness: 40mm
Length: 160mm
Weight:5kg

*10kg Far Infrared Bacteria Home is a approximately 35 liters of filter medium.

name: Pumice Stone 10kg
description_text:
Pumice stone Filter Media is now being used extensively as an alternative to traditional koi pond filter media in trickle filters and trickle towers.

Pumice stone Filter Media is inert and rapidly colonises with beneficial bacteria which help cleanse the pollutants. It is highly porous making it the ideal media for biological filters of all kinds. Efficient biological filtration depends on the media of choice having an adequate specific surface area (SSA), adequate voiding and water retention time. Pumice Stone Filter media has a massive surface area and is therefore ideal in this application. It can be used as a direct replacement to other ceramic based filter media.

Mountain Tree Fresh Lotus Root Nitro Ring Size: 45x28x20mm 20Liters/CTN
description_text:
The Lotus Root Nitro Ring II features with oblique section plus super porous, to maximize space for nitrobacteria growth and eliminate harmful substance.

It builds an exhaustive and healthy microsystem, and maximizes filter space at the same time.

  • Perfect choice for small filter system
  • Excellent biochemical filtration effect
  • Special design for maximum filter efficiency
  • Premium non-toxic material

Rough surface

The texture helps nitrifying bacteria attach and grow, thus greatly accelerating the establishment of a nitrification system

Special lotus hole structure

Helps the water to carry nitrite and nitrate into the nitrification ring for efficient denitrification reactions, and uses the anaerobic bacteria cultured in the micropores inside the nitrification ring.

Save more filter space

More filter space can be saved due to the oblique section, and the beveled nitrification rings accumulate together, which can disrupt the flow of water and prolong the flow of water in the area where the nitrification ring resides, so as to improve the filtration efficiency.

Benefit to cultivating bacteria

The micro hole helps to cultivate the aerobic nitrifying bacteria community on the surface of nitro rings, while the internal micropores are conducive to the cultivation of anaerobic bacteria for denitrification reactions, which decomposes NO3 into nitrogen and oxygen through denitrification.

vessel. This flow is created with your air pump and air stones or diffuser etc.

Technical Data

Net weight kg 4.10

name: Kplus Advanced Filter Media 50Litre
description_text:
New advanced filtration media

After extensive research, a new media has been developed to address this issue while providing class-leading surface area for enhanced biological and mechanical filtration.

During production, K+Media is infused with minerals and enzymes, resulting in a filtration media that outperforms competitors by offering a large protected surface area while significantly reducing the time required for biofilm establishment.

During production, a variety of minerals, including magnesium, calcium, enzymes, and salt, are mixed into the raw material for K+Media manufacturing. This results in K+Media maturing much faster than many other types of media. The minerals create a rough surface on the media, featuring a microscopic honeycomb of peaks and craters that allow waste particles to collect and nitrifying bacteria to thrive. Serving as a food source, the minerals promote the development and multiplication of bacteria, thus improving development times. Calcium has proven advantages for establishing and maintaining effective biofilms. Enzymes are also added to enhance the media's adhesive properties, facilitating the adherence of waste particles. Salt, added during production, dissolves during cooling, leaving a rough surface ideal for biofilm adhesion.

With its new shape and profile, K+Media boasts an unparalleled surface area, providing an overall surface area of 1,350m² per m³. Importantly for biological filtration, the protected surface area of K+Media is 1,025m² per m³. This allows for the formation and preservation of a stable biofilm, particularly beneficial in moving bed biological filtration systems.

name: Black Knight Spawning Brushes (2 in a Box)
description_text:
Why do i need

2 brushes, each 59" x 5.5" (1500mm x 140mm) diameter. If you have mature koi of each gender, they will be ready to spawn at any time from April to August.  The earliest they will spawn is temperature and daylight dependent and so a warm spring will bring the season forward and cold weather will delay it.  Koi look for somewhere suitable to lay their eggs.  In nature this will be plants, roots and filamentous algae.  Since most domestic koi ponds are devoid or short of these, either the koi will not spawn at all or they will try to spawn on the walls of the pond.  The very act of spawning is extremely energetic and so the fish are at risk of damaging themselves on the hard edges of the pond if they have nothing more suitable on which to spawn. Spawning brushes are ideal particularly when breeding your koi have no natural plant life to spawn on. Our koi spawning brushes are particularly important for ponds that do not have water hyacinths and other plant life that are essential to your koi‚‚¾‚s reproduction. Each Black Knight spawning brush is approximately 59 inches (159cm) long with a diameter of 5.5 inches (14cm). They are lighter, more compact alternatives to koi spawning mats and mops. Unlike other spawning products, our koi spawning brushes are extremely easy to use. Black Knight spawning brushes are designed to be harmless to the fish (they are soft and smooth) and to emulate plants.  Simply placing the brushes appropriately in the pond will provide a focal point for the fish that is out of harm‚‚¾‚s way and will dramatically reduce the chances that the fish will injure themselves on the side of the pond.  

How do they work

Our spawning brushes need no preparation before use.  They can be suspended on the pond in the most suitable position to encourage the fish to spawn on them. When the mature female is ready, she will give off pheromones which will trigger activity amongst the males.  You will probably first notice something happening during the evening.  Perhaps two to four males will start showing a greater interest in the female and will start following her more closely.  This will be relatively low-key activity for several hours. Koi always start spawning early in the morning and the process can take several hours.  It starts with an escalation in activity and the males will be harrying the female and almost pushing her around.  As soon as she is ready, she will be ready to release her eggs and the process will begin. Cyprinids (members of the carp family) do not lay their eggs all in one go and in one place.  The female will shoot forwards at high speed across the spawning brushes and squirt a few eggs each time onto them.  The eggs are coated in a sticky substance that makes the eggs adhere to the brushes.  During each bombing run (when you see it, you will understand why we are describing it in this way), the males will follow immediately behind the female and will spray their milt over the eggs to fertilise them.  This process will be repeated many times.  A small female may do it 40 times and a very large one may do it 150 times. The eggs will remain stuck to the brushes although you may not be able to see them.  You can lift the brushes out of the water briefly to have a look.  They are translucent and look like tiny spheres of jelly. You can leave the brushes in the pond if you wish for incubation and hatching.  If you want to maximize the number of fry that hatch then it is better to remove the brushes to another oxygenated and filtered tank or pond away from the other fish.  Mature fish will eat many eggs and fry if you let nature take its course in the pond. If you wish to move the fish, ensure that you equalize water temperatures first because a temperature shock will reduce the success rate. Fertilised eggs will show a couple of black spots (the eyes) after two or three days.  All unviable eggs will turn white in a day or two.  The dead eggs will attract fungus which can be minimized by adding some malachite green to the water. In high temperatures, the eggs can hatch in about 3 ½ days and in up to 8 days in cool temperatures.  Typically, a period around 5 days is average and this should be achieved at around 18 ‚‚ 21 deg C.  The fry will hatch and then stick to any nearby object and wait there for a further day while they digest the remainder of their yolk sac.  When the yolk runs out they will swim to the surface to take a gulp of air to inflate their swimbladder for the first time.  From this point on they are free swimming and will be looking for food. A few hours after the fry start to hatch, you should remove the brushes so that the remaining dead eggs do not pollute the water. Koi fry can be difficult to feed artificially for the first two weeks.  In nature they would feed on zooplankton.  These are tiny animals that live in suspension in the water (such as daphnia) and are an ideal first meal for the fry.  You can make your own zooplankton by hatching brine shrimp.  You can buy freeze-dried brine shrimp eggs; you place them in oxygenated warm salt water and they hatch in 1 day.  It is quite a simple process and is ideal for feeding the small fry. You can buy dry fry food from your local aquarist.  This is fine for fry that are a week old but it is a little tricky to get newly hatched fry to start on it. One very important point is to monitor the water quality of your hatching tanks. It is essential that you have good mechanical and biological filtration if you are to raise your young fish successfully.

How to use

Place the brushes below the water level, one above the other slightly away from the edge of the pond.  You can secure them in position by tying strings to the loops at the ends of the brushes. When you put the brushes in the water for the first time they will try to float.  This is because of microbubbles sticking to the brush filaments.  Give the brushes a little shake under water; this will release the bubbles and the brushes will settle at the right height just below the surface.
Maintenance
When you have finished using the brushes, hose them down until they are clean.  When the brushes are dry you can store them for re-use next season.

name: Kplus Advanced Filter Media 25Litre
description_text:
New advanced filtration media

After extensive research, a new media has been developed to address this issue while providing class-leading surface area for enhanced biological and mechanical filtration.

During production, K+Media is infused with minerals and enzymes, resulting in a filtration media that outperforms competitors by offering a large protected surface area while significantly reducing the time required for biofilm establishment.

During production, a variety of minerals, including magnesium, calcium, enzymes, and salt, are mixed into the raw material for K+Media manufacturing. This results in K+Media maturing much faster than many other types of media. The minerals create a rough surface on the media, featuring a microscopic honeycomb of peaks and craters that allow waste particles to collect and nitrifying bacteria to thrive. Serving as a food source, the minerals promote the development and multiplication of bacteria, thus improving development times. Calcium has proven advantages for establishing and maintaining effective biofilms. Enzymes are also added to enhance the media's adhesive properties, facilitating the adherence of waste particles. Salt, added during production, dissolves during cooling, leaving a rough surface ideal for biofilm adhesion.

With its new shape and profile, K+Media boasts an unparalleled surface area, providing an overall surface area of 1,350m² per m³. Importantly for biological filtration, the protected surface area of K+Media is 1,025m² per m³. This allows for the formation and preservation of a stable biofilm, particularly beneficial in moving bed biological filtration systems.

description_text:

Mountain Tree Filter Brushes are made of new plastic material with good shape and not easy to deform, can be used for more than 5 years, which is 5 times than conventional brush.

Serves as both physical and biological filtration mechanism

Mountain Tree Filter Brushes are used for mechanical filtration in the first filter chamber where the coarse dirt particles, such as remove fish waste or dead plants and algae. Also they are very good settlement area for beneficial microorganisms.

Special Star-Shape Filament is special design patented by Mountain Tree, which is 4 times specific surface area than other brushes. It will generally enhance the mechanical filtration. Obviously strengthen the ability of adsorption and provide a massive surface area for biological colonization.

  • Four times filtration power stronger than normal single thread brushes with the six-pointed star filament
  • Anti-rust weight bearings with 304/316 stainless steel to avoid secondary pollution
  • Easy installation and move with open hook head
  • Excellent physical and biological filtration-blocks wastes and cultures bacteria

name: Black foam cartridges (12"x 4"x 4")"
description_text:
Why do i need

Our brushes are used in filtration systems in fish farms, hatcheries, public aquaria, domestic fish ponds and research institutes in this country and abroad. No other filter medium is as widely used or has been as extensively tested and proved.

How do they work

Whichever installation design you choose, the method of water introduction to the chamber will have an effect on the efficiency of the brushes. Generally the water should flow into the chamber at slow speed rather than being jetted in under pressure. Water travelling at high speed not only causes turbulence, which will disturb settled material, but it can also wash off some of the waste which has been trapped successfully in the brushes.

How to use

Before purchasing Black Knight brushes, you should decide what type of filter design will be best for your pond. How to use Black Knight Filter Brushes If you have a small pond with a few goldfish and a couple of koi then a single chamber with three to six lines of brushes will be ideal. For a more demanding situation, it will be necessary to use a much larger chamber or to link two or three together. These can all contain brushes or you can use them in the first and second chambers and then use a stone medium such  Alfagrog in the last chamber.
Maintenance
When a significant amount of waste has built up on the brushes, it should be flushed away. The brushes should be flushed using buckets of pond water. Cleaning in this way will retain most of the beneficial bacteria that live on the brushes but the rotting waste is removed and cannot do any more harm to the water quality.

name: Kplus Advanced Filter Media - Black 50Litre
description_text:
Plastic media pioneered in biological pond filters, particularly in moving bed bio reactors, two decades ago, brought about a significant shift in filtration technology. However, a persistent issue has been the lengthy time required to establish a stable biofilm crucial for filtration effectiveness.

The K+ Sinking Filter Media, manufactured in the UK, boasts an innovative design with unmatched surface area for enhanced biological and mechanical filtration. Through precise extrusion, integrate minerals, enzymes, and additives into the raw material, resulting in a media that surpasses competitors by providing a large protected surface area while significantly reducing maturation times.

During production, a range of minerals including magnesium, calcium, enzymes, and salt are meticulously infused into the raw material used for K+Media. This process creates a rough surface on the media, ideal for waste particle collection and nitrifying bacteria colonization. The minerals serve as a vital food source, accelerating bacteria development and multiplication. Additionally, enzymes enhance the media's adhesive properties, aiding waste particle adherence, while salt promotes biofilm formation.

With its new shape and profile, the K+ Sinking Filter Media offers an unparalleled surface area, crucial for stable biofilm formation. This ensures optimal biological filtration, particularly in moving bed biological filtration systems.

The unique shape of K+ Sinking Filter Media maximizes quiet zones, facilitating stable biofilm development. This feature, coupled with an additional layer of cells and fins, enables microscopic organisms, distinguishing our media from competitors.

In conclusion, our new filtration media addresses the challenges of traditional plastic media, offering accelerated maturation times and superior biological filtration, making it a game-changer in pond filtration technology.

name: Vortex Brushes
description_text:
Why do i need

102" x 4" (2600mm x 100mm) diameter. Vortex chambers are good for settling out heavy waste but much less efficient with the lightweight particles. Have you noticed that even though you get a lot of waste in the bottom of your vortex, you still find that the subsequent chambers get very dirty too. This is the very fine particles that do not have time to settle in the vortex and so they get drawn through the transfer port into the next chamber. 

How do they work

Black Knight brushes work in three ways. First, they physically trap the large particles that cannot pass through the close weave of the interlocking filaments. Secondly, the filaments have a static charge that ‚‚¹grabs‚‚¾‚ any small particles that are flowing by. This charge holds onto the waste until you do your routine cleaning. Thirdly, after you have been using the brushes for a few weeks, the massive surface area of the brushes becomes home to millions of beneficial nitrifying bacteria that will help to purify your water biologically.

How to use

Simply insert a vortex brush in the path of the flowing water and you will be amazed at how much waste is collected in a short time. If your second and subsequent chambers are already full of media then you can use either one vortex brush strategically placed around the transfer port or you can use several to build up a barrier of them above the inlet of the vortex and below the outlet (assuming that your vortex is designed in this way). This will allow the heavy waste to drop to the bottom of the chamber and then all the waste that does not settle is forced to pass through the brushes thus allowing it to be caught. You can coil one or two vortex brushes around the outlet so that the water has to pass through the brushes. You can create a complete barrier filling the whole cross section of the chamber. The more brushes you use, the greater the amount of waste that can be collected and also the larger the surface area for biological filtration Vortex brushes can be used in as many chambers as you wish. It is a good idea to leave some room in the first chamber to allow for settlement but subsequent chambers can be filled with vortex or filter brushes as shown.
Maintenance
The frequency of cleaning will depend upon the size of the filter relative to the pond size and also the loading on the system i.e. the bodyweight of fish in the pond, how much they are eating and how much dust and plant debris is being produced. The rule of thumb is - the more often you do your cleaning, the cleaner your pond will be. On a lightly loaded system then once every three weeks in the warm months may be sufficient but twice a week may be necessary on a heavily loaded system. Brushes can be cleaned in-situ if you wish. Simply drain the chamber and then rinse the brushes by pouring buckets of pond water over them. Alternatively, you can take the brushes out, clean and then replace them. You can use chlorinated tapwater for cleaning them but you will temporarily reduce the biological effectiveness of the brushes with this method.

name: NT Labs Zeolite 5kg
description_text:
NT Labs Zeolite

When to use? For best results, use NT Labs Zeolite throughout the year and recharge it regularly. Consider recharging and topping up when water quality begins to decline.

How to use:

  1. Place the zeolite into the filter bag provided and rinse it under the tap.
  2. Position the zeolite in the filter in an area with a strong flow of water.
  3. Test your water quality using NT Labs Test Kits regularly.
  4. Recharge the zeolite in spring and every 6 weeks unless poor water quality is detected. When recharging, replace 50% of the zeolite.
  5. To recharge, prepare a salt solution (4 tablespoons per gallon of water) and soak the zeolite chunks for 24 hours.

Note: Zeolite is commonly used in pond filtration systems to help absorb and remove ammonia and other nitrogenous compounds. Recharging the zeolite helps maintain its effectiveness over time.

name: Oase Replacement foam set for Filtoclear 12000
description_text:
For FiltoClear 12000. The heart of a filter are its filter sponges - especially this filter sponge set, which combines the blue and red sponges in a small space. Red filter sponges have fine filtering properties, while the blue ones are coarse. This means that, depending on the flow speed of the water, small or only larger particles get stuck in the sponges and are thus withdrawn from the pond water. But they don't just do the classic filtration, they also provide the smallest bacteria with plenty of living space. This small biological oasis in the red filter sponges ensures that any toxins that have arisen in the pond are converted: Toxic substances are converted into harmless but algae-stimulating substances (nitrification), which in turn are converted into naturally occurring gases (denitrification).

  • Significant load capacity with high dimensional stability
  • Constant and regular water flow thanks to a fixed pore size
  • 100% compatible with animals, plants and microorganisms

Technical Data

Scope of delivery 2 x red; 3 x blue
Suitable for FiltoClear 12000

name: Media Bags (pack of 50)
description_text: Filter Media Bags serve as invaluable tools for containing materials such as Pumice or Alfagrog. Crafted from a robust plastic resin base, these durable sacks are suitable for various filter media types and maintain their integrity even when fully submerged. Equipped with a convenient draw cord, they facilitate quick sealing. These bags offer an ideal solution for easy access during routine cleaning of the filter contents.

name: K1 Micro Media - 1ltr
description_text:
K1 Moving Bed process, which has been scientifically tried and tested in fish
farming and waste water treatment for over 10 years, is now available for fish
keepers and is exclusively distributed worldwide by Evolution Aqua.
The media is engineered in a wheel shape and is slightly positively buoyant.
This allows a small amount of water flow to circulate the media throughout the
vessel. This flow is created with your air pump and air stones or diffuser etc.

name: Replacement Foams for Biotec 18/36/60/140 Blue (set of 2)
description_text:
The blue filter sponges for the BioTec ScreenMatic² 60000 and 140000 flow filters are easy to use and easy to clean. They are part of the biological / mechanical filtration in the BioTec filter: Coarse dirt particles are retained in the coarse-pored blue bio-bodies. Due to the enrichment with oxygen, Nitrosomonas bacteria quickly form in the blue zone, which convert ammonia, which is extremely harmful to fish, into nitrite. Also suitable for the previous BioTec ScreenMatic 18/36 model. 

Contents: 2 filter sponges.

name: Filter cartridge set for biotec premium 8000
description_text:
The heart of a filter is its filter sponges - filter cartridge set for the BioTec Premium 80000. Included in the set are 2 purple filter sponges, which have rather coarse filtration properties. The higher flow rate is particularly beneficial for the oxygen-loving filter bacteria. These microorganisms ensure that the degradation products in the pond are converted into harmless substances (nitrification). This is especially true for the two blue filter sponges included. The two red filter sponges, on the other hand, show their strengths with fine filtration properties and thus remove the smallest dirt particle residues from the water at a slow flow rate. The ideal team effort for your BioTec Premium with perfect filter results.

Technical data

name: Replacement foam set FiltoClear 13000
description_text:
The OASE replacement sponge set for FiltoClear 13000 pressure filters is optimally matched to these filters. The sponges are extremely resilient and dimensionally stable. This is particularly important for sponges that are squeezed and released during the cleaning process in the filter using cleaning handles. The optimally selected pore size ensures a constant and even flow of the water to be cleaned. For lasting results it is recommended to replace the sponges at the beginning of the pond season in March/April. After replacing the filter sponges, it is advisable to use OASE filter starter preparations to accelerate the regeneration of the pond biology in the filter. The OASE replacement sponge set for FiltoClear 13000 pressure filters is 100% compatible with fish and plants. 

Technical Data

Scope of delivery 1 x red; 1 x blue; 1 x violet
Suitable for FiltoClear 13000

1.5" 90 Bend (Pressure PVC-U)
description_text:
The 1.5" 90 Bend (Pressure PVC-U) is a plumbing fitting designed to change the direction of a pipeline by 90 degrees. It is made of pressure PVC-U, a type of plastic that is resistant to corrosion and UV light, making it ideal for use in both indoor and outdoor environments.

This 1.5" 90 Bend has a diameter of 1.5 inch and is designed to connect to standard PVC pipes with ease. It features a smooth interior surface to reduce friction and ensure a smooth flow of liquids or gases through the pipeline. The bend is also pressure-rated, meaning it is designed to withstand the pressure of the fluid being transported through it.

Overall, the 1.5" 90 Bend (Pressure PVC-U) is a reliable and essential component for any plumbing or piping system. Its durable construction and easy installation make it a popular choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. So, it can be a good choice for those who need a flexible and durable plumbing fitting for their projects.

Dark grey 10 BAR PVC pipe fittings for use as pressure pipe, bends are produced according to DIN standards. High quality material and professional production guarantee a long service life for these fittings for your irrigation system. Suited for many purposes, such as irrigation and swimming pools.

Our PVC pipe fittings are both strong and economically priced. Because we use UV resistant plastic - the products are extremely durable and can be exposed to sunlight for long periods.

name: 4" Connector with Clips (Flexible)
description_text:
Our rubber fittings offer a quick, versatile and easy to use solution to every domestic drain, waste and vent plumbing problem. Fittings are available in a variety of sizes ranging are ideal for connecting pipes with differing outside diameters whether due to different pipe materials or pipe sizes. They provide an effective solution for joining pipes with similar outside diameters and are ideal for any emergency repairs whatever the pipe size or material.

name: 1.5" ERA Ball Valve
description_text:
Introducing the ERA Ball Valve – Your Trusted Solution for Precision Control!

A pinnacle of high-quality engineering. Made with precision and durability in mind, this ball valve stands out as a top-tier choice for industries and applications demanding superior performance.

ERA Ball Valves Excellence:

  • Manufactured by ERA, a name synonymous with excellence in the industry. Expect nothing less than top-notch quality and reliability.

High-Quality PVC Construction:

  • Engineered with premium-grade PVC, our ball valve ensures resilience against corrosion and abrasion, guaranteeing a long service life even in demanding environments.

Precision Control:

  • Designed for precise flow control in pressure pipe systems, the ERA Ball Valve offers smooth operation, allowing you to regulate the flow with accuracy and confidence.

Durable and Robust:

  • Built to withstand high-pressure conditions, this ball valve excels in durability. Its robust construction ensures longevity, making it a cost-effective choice for your industrial or commercial applications.

Reliable Sealing Mechanism:

  • The ERA Ball Valve boasts a reliable sealing mechanism, preventing leaks and ensuring a tight seal. This reliability minimizes downtime and maintenance costs.

Versatile Applications:

  • Ideal for a wide range of pressure pipe applications, including but not limited to water supply, irrigation, industrial processes, and more. Its versatility makes it a valuable asset across various industries.

Easy Installation:

  • Engineered for user-friendly installation, these ball valves save you time and effort during setup. The design ensures a secure fit, contributing to a hassle-free installation process.

Upgrade your pressure pipe systems with the ERA Ball Valve – where high quality meets precision control. Invest in reliability, durability, and performance for a seamless flow control experience in your industrial or commercial operations. Trust ERA for excellence in every valve turn!

name: 110mm 90 Bend (Solvent Weld)

name: Economy Bottom Drains
description_text:
ECONOMY BOTTOM DRAINS for ponds are plumbing fixtures designed to remove excess water and debris from the bottom of a pond. These drains are typically installed in the lowest point of the pond, and are used to help maintain proper water levels and circulation.

Economy bottom drains for ponds are an affordable and effective way to keep your pond clean and well-maintained. They are easy to install and use, and are designed to withstand the harsh outdoor conditions found in pond environments.

In addition to helping maintain proper water levels and circulation, bottom drains can also be used to drain water from a pond during the winter months or when making repairs or renovations. This can help prevent damage to the pond and make maintenance tasks easier to complete.

Overall, ECONOMY BOTTOM DRAINS for ponds are a useful and cost-effective addition to any pond, and are an essential component of any pond maintenance routine.

50 mm: round 20 cm and lid round 22 cm.
110 mm: round 32 cm and lid 38 cm.

name: 50mm Bottom drain with chamber
description_text:
The 50mm Bottom drain with chamber is a plumbing fixture designed to remove excess water and debris from the bottom of a pond. This drain is typically installed in the lowest point of the pond, and is used to help maintain proper water levels and circulation.

The 50mm Bottom drain with chamber features a chamber, which is a container or enclosure that is attached to the drain. This chamber serves as a catchment area for debris and other contaminants that are removed from the water by the drain. The chamber helps to filter out larger particles and can be easily emptied when needed.

Made from durable materials, the 50mm Bottom drain with chamber is resistant to wear and tear and can withstand the harsh outdoor conditions found in pond environments. It is easy to install and use, and is an essential component of any pond maintenance routine. So, this drain is a must-have for anyone who owns or uses a pond.

description_text:
The 1" Hose Clips (Yellow) are fastening devices designed to secure hoses to fittings or other components. They are made of a durable stainless steel and plastic and feature a yellow color for easy identification.

These 1" hose clips have a diameter of 1 inch and are designed to fit standard hoses with a similar diameter. They feature a screw mechanism that allows them to be tightened or loosened as needed, making it easy to install and remove the hose. The yellow color of the clips makes them easy to spot in busy environments, ensuring that they are not overlooked during maintenance or inspection.

Overall, the 1" Hose Clips (Yellow) are a reliable and essential component for any system that requires the secure attachment of hoses. Their durable construction and easy operation make them a popular choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. So, they can be a good choice for those who need flexible and durable hose fasteners for their projects.

name: 1.5" End Caps (solvent weld)
description_text:
This solvent-weld blank end cap is specifically crafted to seamlessly integrate with solvent-weld pipes. Ideal for various applications in pond and filter system construction, solvent-weld blank end caps offer a swift and straightforward method for sealing rigid pipes and fittings. They are exceptionally suited for use in ponds, gardens, water features, and drainage systems.

Designed to fit securely onto the outer diameter of pipes and fittings, these blank end caps ensure a watertight seal when paired with a non-toxic adhesive.

name: 6"-4" Reducing Connector with clips (Flexible)
description_text:
Our rubber fittings offer a quick, versatile and easy to use solution to every domestic drain, waste and vent plumbing problem. Fittings are available in a variety of sizes ranging are ideal for connecting pipes with differing outside diameters whether due to different pipe materials or pipe sizes. They provide an effective solution for joining pipes with similar outside diameters and are ideal for any emergency repairs whatever the pipe size or material.
Made from a durable Thermoplastic compound, they provide a leakproof seal on many pipe materials including plastic, cast iron, asbestos cement, clay, concrete, steel, fibre and cast iron.

name: 4" Pipe Clamp Bracket (Cobra)
description_text:
This SuperFlo 4" pipe clip is made of polypropylene with a M.5/1BA/No.10 bolt/screw. Suitable for low temperature fluid transportation, SuperFlo provides a wide temperature range and the full system remains extremely ductile right down to -40°C. Lighter in weight and easier to handle on-site than traditional materials, this ABS system provides time and cost savings at installation.

Product features

  • Lightweight

  • Easy to install

  • Wide temperature range

  • Tough and durable

  • Corrosion-resistant

  • WRAS approved

name: 1" Hose Joiner Barbed
description_text:
The 1" Hose Joiner is a plumbing fitting designed to connect two hoses end-to-end. It is made of a durable plastic and features barbed ends, which allow it to securely attach to standard hose tubing.

This 1" hose joiner has a diameter of 1 inch and is designed to connect to hoses with a similar diameter. It is an essential component for any system that requires the connection of hoses, such as in irrigation systems or industrial equipment.

Overall, the 1" Hose Joiner is a reliable and essential component for any system that requires the connection of hoses. Its durable construction and easy installation make it a popular choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. So, it can be a good choice for those who need a flexible and durable hose connector for their projects.

Note: these insert fittings are especially for PE-pipes, this makes the size of the tulle some millimetres smaller!!
The given size, is the external size of the PE-pipe. For low pressure application a hose clip is not needed because of the sharp edges
on the tulle. Max. 4 bar at 20ºC.

name: 1.5" 90 Bend Plain - Threaded (Pressure PVC-U)
description_text:
The 1.5" Threaded & Plain 90 Bend (Pressure PVC-U) is a vital plumbing fitting crafted for a seamless 90-degree redirection of pipelines. Made from robust pressure PVC-U, this plastic marvel is resistant to corrosion and UV light, making it an ideal choice for both indoor and outdoor applications.

Designed for ease of use, one end of this 1.5" 90 Bend is threaded, while the other remains plain, offering adaptability to various piping systems. With a 1.5-inch diameter, it effortlessly connects to standard PVC pipes, ensuring a secure and leak-free fit.

The durable pressure PVC-U construction ensures this bend is pressure-rated, guaranteeing resilience against the transported fluids and ensuring a prolonged service life. Its smooth interior surface minimizes friction, facilitating a smooth flow of liquids or gases through the pipeline.

The 1.5" Threaded & Plain 90 Bend (Pressure PVC-U) is your go-to plumbing component for directional changes, offering reliability and ease of installation. Whether you're a professional or a DIY enthusiast, this bend's durability and adaptability make it an essential choice for any plumbing or piping system. Suited for diverse purposes, from irrigation systems to swimming pools, its dark grey 10 BAR PVC composition adheres to DIN standards, ensuring high-quality material and professional production for a long-lasting solution in your projects. Choose reliability with the 1.5" Threaded & Plain 90 Bend!

name: 1.5" Inch Male to Male Joiner KK
1" ERA Ball Valve
description_text:
Introducing the ERA Ball Valve – Your Trusted Solution for Precision Control!

A pinnacle of high-quality engineering. Made with precision and durability in mind, this ball valve stands out as a top-tier choice for industries and applications demanding superior performance.

ERA Ball Valves Excellence:

  • Manufactured by ERA, a name synonymous with excellence in the industry. Expect nothing less than top-notch quality and reliability.

High-Quality PVC Construction:

  • Engineered with premium-grade PVC, our ball valve ensures resilience against corrosion and abrasion, guaranteeing a long service life even in demanding environments.

Precision Control:

  • Designed for precise flow control in pressure pipe systems, the ERA Ball Valve offers smooth operation, allowing you to regulate the flow with accuracy and confidence.

Durable and Robust:

  • Built to withstand high-pressure conditions, this ball valve excels in durability. Its robust construction ensures longevity, making it a cost-effective choice for your industrial or commercial applications.

Reliable Sealing Mechanism:

  • The ERA Ball Valve boasts a reliable sealing mechanism, preventing leaks and ensuring a tight seal. This reliability minimizes downtime and maintenance costs.

Versatile Applications:

  • Ideal for a wide range of pressure pipe applications, including but not limited to water supply, irrigation, industrial processes, and more. Its versatility makes it a valuable asset across various industries.

Easy Installation:

  • Engineered for user-friendly installation, these ball valves save you time and effort during setup. The design ensures a secure fit, contributing to a hassle-free installation process.

Upgrade your pressure pipe systems with the ERA Ball Valve – where high quality meets precision control. Invest in reliability, durability, and performance for a seamless flow control experience in your industrial or commercial operations. Trust ERA for excellence in every valve turn!

name: 3" OMEGA Ball Valve (Double Union) BLUE HANDLE
description_text:
The 3" 

Omega Ball Valve (Double Union) stands as a reliable and efficient solution for your plumbing requirements, prioritizing functionality and practicality. Engineered with precision, this ball valve offers key features to simplify installation, maintenance, and everyday operation.

The double union configuration ensures hassle-free maintenance and installation. With the ability to disconnect without impacting the entire plumbing system, the TP Ball Valve provides an efficient solution for your plumbing needs.

This ball valve guarantees a secure and leak-free connection, The distinctive blue handle serves a practical purpose, providing high visibility for quick identification of the valve's open and closed positions. This feature enhances user-friendliness, allowing for efficient operation in any plumbing system.

Constructed with durability in mind, the Omega Ball Valve is built to withstand the demands of different applications. The robust materials used ensure a prolonged service life, reducing the need for frequent replacements and maintenance.

Suitable for a range of applications, including water systems and industrial processes, the Omega Ball Valve's versatility makes it an essential component for addressing various plumbing needs with reliability and efficiency.

name: Spindrifter 4" Pressure Bottom Drain for Concrete
description_text:
The Spindrifter bottom drain is known worldwide for its quality and design. This unit completely replaces the "Standard Bottom Drain."
The most noticeable feature is the extra connection in the sump of the drain. This allows the air supply hose to enter the  sump independently of the water outlet pipe, thus eliminating the possibility of restriction to the water flow and somewhere else for blanket weed to attach. The membrane and backing plate fit into a recess in the specially manufactured dome (provided). The recess in the dome prevents the membrane from becoming detached. The complete assembly is secured to the bottom drain by means of stem, which also provides the air inlet. Most water pipe sizes can be accommodated, the customer to specify. The air inlet is via a nickel plated connector.

description_text:
The Complete 110mm Bottom Drain with Aereation lid is a plumbing fixture designed to remove excess water and debris from the bottom of a pond. This drain is typically installed in the lowest point of the pond, and is used to help maintain proper water levels and circulation.

The Complete 110mm Bottom Drain with Aereation lid features an aeration lid, which is a cover or top that is designed to allow air to flow through the drain and into the pond. This helps to improve the circulation and oxygenation of the water in the pond, which is essential for the overall health and quality of the water.

The aeration lid is easy to install and use, and is compatible with 110mm bottom drains. It is made from durable materials, which are resistant to wear and tear and can withstand the harsh outdoor conditions found in pond environments.

name: Pond Grade Underlay 150g/sqm 2mtrs wide (Per running mtr)
description_text: Our underlays offer exceptionally high performance and provide a highly protective barrier between substrate and liner. We recommend that our heavy duty underlay is used beneath all of our liners, not only to help protect the liners from penetration by sharp stones, roots etc, but also to reduce excessive localised stretching of the liner when ground settlement occurs over time.

name: Greenseal Liner 0.75mm (per square meter)
description_text:
SealEco EPDM (Greenseal) pond liner is a synthetic rubber pond liner with exceptional physical properties making it the ideal choice for lining garden ponds, ornamental lakes and streams.

SealEco EPDM is the fish-safe EPDM pond liner produced by the same Swedish manufacturer that has supplied our Butyl for more than 30 years, SealEco AB(formally Trelleborg AB). During production the EPDM is vulcanised (cured under pressure and heat) creating an elastic, chemically stable product with negligible aging through exposure to UV-radiation, atmosphere, chemicals, earth, water and extremes of temperature.

SealEco EPDM pond liner is black in colour and remains very flexible even at low temperatures, so is ideal for small and medium size fish ponds with steps and shelves.

name: Firestone Liner 1mm (per square mtr)
description_text:
Firestone PondGard is an EPDM Geomembrane specifically designed for garden pond and lake applications. Its formulation and production process makes it perfectly compatible with aquatic life, in accordance with test reports published by the UK Water Research Centre. Firestone’s EPDM manufacturing facilities have received ISO 9001 certification for their total quality management principles and ISO 14001 certification for their environmental management systems. PondGard carries a 20 year guarantee.

Easily shaped to fit the size and contours of any water feature, the flexibility of PondGard liners means more creative freedom and the ability to accomplish even the most challenging designs. 

PondGard Rubber Liners require virtually no maintenance after installation. And in the unlikely event of a puncture, the liner can be quickly repaired on-site with a self-adhesive QuickSeam Joint Cover Patch, minimizing cost and inconvenience. PondGard liners display outstanding resistance to UV exposure, ozone, frost, snow and extreme temperatures. Developed to protect against microbial attacks and algae growth, our liners contain no migrating plasticizers – which means no cracking or splitting. This means twenty years after installation; many water features built with PondGard Rubber Liner are as functional and beautiful as the day they were installed.

Continued rise in the cost of Butyl rubber polymer however, limits its economical application for lining ponds that require large quantities of material.

name: Floating Surface Skimmer with Basket (200mm Dia Fits 110mm Pipe)
description_text:
Introducing the latest version of our highly acclaimed floating surface skimmer, designed to provide unparalleled efficiency and versatility in maintaining the cleanliness of your pond. With its robust construction and advanced features, this skimmer is a game-changer in pond maintenance.

The Floating Surface Skimmer boasts a compact design with a diameter of 190mm, making it suitable for various pond sizes. Its 110mm pipe connection ensures a secure and efficient water flow, maximizing its skimming capabilities. This skimmer is specifically engineered to effortlessly remove debris, leaves, and surface pollutants, leaving your pond surface pristine and inviting.

One of the standout features of this skimmer is its included basket. This removable accessory allows you to easily collect and dispose of the captured debris, keeping your pond free from unsightly contaminants. However, if you have a pre-filter, such as our UltraSieve, you have the option to connect the skimmer directly to it, eliminating the need for the basket. This adaptability provides greater flexibility in customization and meets the specific requirements of your pond setup.

The Floating Surface Skimmer's user-friendly design ensures seamless operation and effortless maintenance. Its installation is quick and hassle-free, and once in place, it works tirelessly to keep your pond surface clean and clear. With minimal maintenance required, you can spend more time enjoying your pond and less time worrying about its upkeep.

Upgrade your pond maintenance routine with the Floating Surface Skimmer and experience the convenience and effectiveness it offers. Say goodbye to the frustration of manual skimming and let this skimmer do the hard work for you. Enjoy a cleaner and healthier pond environment, all with the help of our innovative and reliable floating surface skimmer.

description_text:
Introducing the Floating Surface Skimmer, a revolutionary solution designed to effortlessly maintain the clarity and cleanliness of your pond's surface. With its intelligent design and seamless compatibility with existing pond setups, this skimmer is a must-have for any pond enthusiast.

The Floating Surface Skimmer is ingeniously crafted to fit a 110mm pipe, providing a direct connection to your pump or filter. Its unique feature includes a sliding mechanism that seamlessly fits over a 160-110mm reducer, ensuring a secure and leak-proof connection. By utilizing a 110mm tank connector, this skimmer enables efficient water flow, optimizing its skimming capabilities.

With a height of 280mm and a diameter of 160mm, this skimmer strikes the perfect balance between functionality and space efficiency. Its compact size allows for easy installation and integration into various pond sizes, ensuring a versatile solution for any aquatic environment.

Designed for both practicality and ease of use, the Floating Surface Skimmer excels in its maintenance capabilities. By swiftly removing debris, leaves, and surface pollutants, it prevents them from sinking and affecting the water quality. This skimmer effectively enhances the aesthetics of your pond while promoting a healthy and balanced ecosystem.

Installation and setup are a breeze with the Floating Surface Skimmer. Simply slide it over the 160-110mm reducer, connect it to your pump or filter via the 110mm tank connector, and witness the immediate transformation of your pond's surface. Its durable construction and reliable performance ensure long-term functionality, minimizing the need for frequent adjustments or replacements.

Upgrade your pond maintenance routine with the Floating Surface Skimmer and experience the difference it can make in keeping your pond surface clean and inviting. Enjoy a hassle-free skimming process and revel in the beauty of a well-maintained pond. Invest in the Floating Surface Skimmer today and unlock the full potential of your aquatic oasis.

name: AquaForte Floating Skimmer (built in 60w pump)
description_text:
Introducing the AquaForte Floating Skimmer with a built-in 60W pump, the perfect solution for maintaining a clean and beautiful pond surface. With its impressive 3000 l/h capacity, this skimmer is designed to effectively remove debris and maintain water clarity, ensuring a healthy environment for your aquatic ecosystem.

Engineered for ponds of up to approximately 50m², this floating skimmer is a reliable companion for medium-sized to larger water features. Its sleek and durable design allows it to effortlessly glide across the water, efficiently collecting leaves, twigs, and other unwanted particles that may mar the appearance of your pond.

Ease of use and maintenance were key considerations in the development of the AquaForte Floating Skimmer. Equipped with a convenient skimmer basket, it captures and holds the collected debris, preventing it from sinking and potentially affecting the water quality. The included foam filter pad further enhances filtration, capturing finer particles and ensuring crystal-clear water.

Cleaning the skimmer is a breeze. Simply remove the skimmer basket and foam filter pad, empty the collected debris, rinse them off, and place them back into the skimmer. With minimal effort, you can restore the skimmer to its optimal functioning and maintain the pristine condition of your pond.

The AquaForte Floating Skimmer comes with a generous 10-meter cable, providing flexibility in positioning the skimmer within your pond. Whether you have a small garden pond or a larger water feature, this skimmer offers versatility and adaptability to suit your specific needs.

Invest in the AquaForte Floating Skimmer with a built-in 60W pump and experience the joy of a clear and healthy pond surface. Enjoy a low-maintenance solution that efficiently removes debris, maintains water clarity, and enhances the overall aesthetics of your water feature.

name: AquaForte Tornado III Protein Skimmer
description_text:
Back on the road! Renewed model with ball valve for flow control and special new biorings for even better mix of oxygen. Thanks to the ball valve it is much easier to adjust the correct water level. Through a 4mm air connection and supplied flowmeter an air pump continuously pumps 0,5l/m (30l/h) air into the filter. This pressure ensures that the foam is pushed out of the filter through the foam outlet tube. The protein skimmer is a combination of a biological, mechanical and chemical filter.

The principle works as follows: the surface of an air bubble attracts substances dissolved in water. Due to the attraction of air bubbles, chemicals, dirt particles, dyes and algae are concentrated. Air is mixed with water by means of an air pump. By forcing this mixture through the filter material (biorings) to a lower outlet, a very long contact time between water and air is created. This changes the surface tension of the water continuously and creates a firm foam. This foam is separated from the purified water by a perforated cone and discharged. Substances dissolved in the water such as phosphates, ammonia, Humic acids, dyes, proteins and a number of heavy metals are filtered out of the water and discharged by means of the foam.

Water inlet: 25mm, water outlet: 40mm, foam outlet: 25mm.

name: Oase AquaSkim 40 Standing Skimmer
description_text:
The OASE AquaSkim 40 keeps the water surface of up to 40 m² clean and is an ideal addition to the AquaMax Eco Premium models 8000-16000 and Twin 20/30000. The skimmer basket has a diameter of 170 mm. It can be easily adapted to the pond depth thanks to the two-part telescopic tube, which is infinitely height-adjustable from 300 to 800 mm. The skimmer compensates for water level differences of up to 120 mm. The filter basket volume is 1.4 l. The skimmer lets through dirt particles up to 10 mm in size. Thanks to the 350 mm base, the AquaSkim 40 can be fixed to the pond floor with stones that are particularly stable. The small pipe diameter of 80 mm also ensures less air content and thus prevents the skimmer, which has a connection with a universal stepped hose nozzle from ¾ "to 1½".

  • The result is clearly improved water quality and viewing depth through direct suction removal of pollutants on the surface
  • Base with large surface receptacle shell for rocks as ballast
  • Easy maintenance with easily accessible coarse debris basket
  • Debris basket can also be taken out from a distance via grip hooks
  • Ideal combination with AquaMax Eco Premium filter and watercourse pumps
  • Powerful suction cleaning of pond surfaces up to 40 m²

name: Certikin HD100 Skimmer White
description_text:
Introducing the Certikin HD100 Skimmer in White, a versatile and reliable solution designed for use in koi ponds and swimming pools. Engineered to effectively extract and retain leaves, floating debris, and other contaminants from the water's surface, this skimmer ensures a clean and inviting swimming environment.

Crafted from white ABS high-strength material, the Certikin HD100 Skimmer boasts a robust one-piece body that minimizes the risk of water loss from the pool. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting performance, providing you with peace of mind and a worry-free pool experience.

This skimmer features outlet connections in both imperial and metric measurements, allowing for easy integration into various plumbing systems. The inclusion of overflow and water fill outlets further enhances its functionality, ensuring proper water level maintenance and preventing any overflow issues.

Designed for flexibility and ease of installation, the Certikin HD100 Skimmer is equipped with an extending collar and a square lid. These features facilitate seamless integration with your pool setup, making the installation process a breeze.

One of the standout features of the Certikin HD100 Skimmer is its extension throats, which allow the skimmer body to be positioned at any distance from the pool wall. This feature proves invaluable when using an automatic pool cover or when designing a pool with an ornate surround. It provides you with the flexibility to create a pool layout that perfectly suits your unique needs and preferences.

Whether you have a concrete/tile pool installation or a concrete/liner pool or panel/liner pool, the Certikin HD100 Skimmer is a versatile choice that delivers exceptional performance. With a recommended flow rate of 7.5m3/h at 0.5m/s and compatibility with 50mm (1.5") pipework, this skimmer ensures efficient water circulation and effective debris removal.

Elevate your swimming pool experience with the Certikin HD100 Skimmer in White. Enjoy a crystal-clear pool surface, free from leaves and floating debris, and indulge in the pleasure of a pristine swimming environment. Invest in the Certikin HD100 Skimmer and experience the quality, reliability, and versatility it brings to your pool.

Its durable construction ensures long-lasting performance, and its easy installation and maintenance make it a convenient choice for adding the soothing sound of flowing water to your backyard oasis.

400mm stainless steel water blade.

Supplied with 1.5" stepped hose tail.

Modern and elegant waterfall in stainless steel design. The 60 cm wide stele made of stainless steel is of high quality and gives the waterfall a particularly elegant character. The Waterfall Kit 60 is very easy to install. An additional mounting foot provides additional stability on a firm surface. Maintenance is particularly easy thanks to the removable back of the stele. Optional waterfall lighting can be installed very easily thanks to the clever integrated light feed-through. We recommend an AquaMax Eco 3500-4000 as a pump (not included). Trust in OASE quality, because you receive a 2-year guarantee.

  • Optional waterfall illumination can be easily installed thanks to the clever integrated light feed-through
  • Easy installation on a solid substrate (eg a concrete slab) for use in a shallow water zone or on the pond edge, thanks to lateral fastening lugs
  • Easy maintenance thanks to the removable rear panel

name: Aquaforte Floating fountain & Nozzle set
description_text: A very professional fountain set including 3 different fountain heads: Classic, Trumpet and Crown & Trumpet. Replacing the fountain heads is very easy; with a simple bayonet connection the head can be replaced within seconds! The fountain is equipped with a float and a 560 watt pump with 30 meter cable. The pump can be adjusted in height/flow with the (optional) controller with remote control which also adjusts the power consumption of the pump. This controller can also control the on/off times of the fountain. The fountain can be programmed up to 6 periods per day. These settings repeat themselves every 24 hours. LED lighting set with 3 lights is optionally available. 1 x 6 watt gives 150 lumens.

name: Oase PondJet Eco
description_text:
Impressive fountain show with a height and width of up to 3 meters as a floating island. The compact floating unit surprises with a completely new level of energy efficiency, because it is up to 60% more economical than its predecessor. Flexible and perfect for short-term use, the ready-to-connect complete set can be installed quickly and easily. Thanks to an innovative dynamic function, changing fountain heights can be switched on individually. Including frost protection down to -20 ° C and "Environmental Function Control". In addition to the fountain pump, the scope of delivery includes the float and the multifunctional nozzle. Your guarantee: 2 years + 1 year requirement guarantee!

  • Floating fountain for flexible installation in bodies of water with any type of floor conditions
  • Ready to connect complete set, consists of: Pump, float body and multifunction nozzle
  • Energy-efficient, thanks to new motor technology; energy savings up to 60% compared with the previous model
  • Alternating fountain heights can be individually switched with power consumption in-line with demand
  • Also ideal for short term use, e.g. for events
  • Towering water spectacle up to 3 meters in height and width
  • Patented frost protection to -20 ° C
  • "Environmental Function Control" (EFC by OASE) protects against dry run and blocking
  • Additional nozzle patterns and illumination set are available as accessories
  • MADE IN GERMANY: precise and reliable German engineering skills at a particularly high quality level

name: Oase Jumping Jet Rainbow Star Set

The JumpingJet Rainbow Star is a ready-to-connect set for impressive water jets. Jet lengths of up to 4 m and jet heights of up to 2 m can be adjusted individually. Pre-set programmes also produce water effects and colours with a constant LED light intensity. The control box allows remote control and connection of the JumpingJet Rainbow Star expansion kit – consisting of an additional JumpingJet – and enables synchronous control of both JumpingJets. In addition to the sturdy body with a high-quality design, the stainless-steel base ensures safe positioning and allows the jet angle to be set individually.

name: AquaForte Superstrong FIX & SEAL 290ml Black
description_text:
Superior-quality, all-purpose construction adhesive, sealant and sealant-adhesive based on MS-polymer.

Excellent bonding with 100% waterproof seal. Excellent sealing with high bonding strength. FIELD OF APPLICATION: for bonding, constructing and sealing of nearly every kind of material to nearly every kind of surface. Ideal for garden, pond and construction use.

Replaces various: acrylic, bitumen, butyl, silicone, polyurethane sealants. Replaces also wood-contact; mirror-tile; construction glues. It can be used under water. Not suited for PE and PP.


Content: 290 ml.

name: Gold Label Underwater Sealer Black 290ml
description_text:
This clever sealer will allow you to repair cracks/holes etc or bond items to your pond/aquarium/tank underwater and is safe for fish!

Being non-toxic, solvent and isocyanate free there is no need to drain your pond or disturb your fish any more in order to make a repair! With the strength of 4 times a normal silicone sealer it will bond almost anything to anything including drains, gutters, tanks, boats, rockery, coral, decking, concrete (please note, if applying to concrete, a PVA or concrete primer will be needed prior to application to seal any loose surfaces), wood, PVC, glass etc.

It will start to work instantly and will continue to cure over 24 hours.

name: AquaForte Landscaping Foam 500ml
description_text:
• Won't discolour like other foam! Blends into shadows
  • Polyurethane sealant; ideal for ponds and waterfalls
  • Fish and plant safe
  • Superior adhesive for landscaping projects. Expands and fills voids
  • Fill knot holes in trees to seal out water and pests
  • Product has a dark grey colour after curing

name: AquaForte Impermax black 10 kg
description_text: Impermax is a single component, high performance waterproofing material, based on Polyurethane, certified according to EEC Directive 98/83/CE, and which can be in direct contact with drinking water for human consumption. It can easily be applied on different kinds of surfaces used in hydraulic infrastructures such as concrete, mortar, ceramics, fibreglass, reinforced polyester, etc. Curing time: 4-6 hours (in the summer), 12-24 hours (in the winter). Not suited for PP or PE. Apply at least 3-4 layers to obtain a membrane thickness of 1.5 to 1.9mm (2 kilo per m^2). It is recommended to use humidity primer in most situations.

description_text:
PondPal is a strong underwater sealant that allows you to repair rips and holes in pond liners. It is non-toxic, is solvent and isocyanate-free so there is no need to drain your pond when making the repair.

Perfect for use with butyl pond liners this pond sealant will bond to a variety of surfaces.

  • Pond and Aquarium Sealer
  • Fish safe sealer that can be used underwater for instant repairs
  • Solvent & Isocyanate Free
  • Bonds all surfaces Ideal for Butyl Rubber, Vinyl, Glass, Plastic, Ceramic, Stone, Concrete and more.
  • Most advanced underwater formula
  • Stronger than Silicone

name: G4 Pond Sealer 5kg Black
description_text: G4 is a durable deep bonding plastic coating for concrete which can be used without primer at low temperatures to seal in the lime in concrete ponds / water features

name: Gold Label Pond Paint Black 5ltr
description_text:
This unique paint is designed to effectively seal and re-paint the concrete lining of your pond. It works using only 2 coats (on smooth surfaces) without needing primer, and as it is water based can be applied to damp surfaces. This means it is also less toxic than traditional pond paints.  It has coverage of 6-8 m2 which also means with 2 coats used (on smooth rendered concrete) it is far more cost effective than the typical pond paints out there. With a second coat application time of 6-48 hours and such ease of application, professional pond builders are choosing Gold Label Pond Paint every time! It comes in a variety of colours and sizes, is easy to mix and apply, and dries after 6-8 hours (full cure 3-7 days). The paint also works on other surfaces such as: blocks, brick, tiles, fibreglass and plastic. It should last approximately 5-10 years, giving you a fresh look to your water tight pond for years to come!

  • No Primer Needed
  • Works on damp surfaces
  • Easy to apply with brush, roller or spray.
  • Water based, therefore easier to clean & less toxic.
  • 2 coats only (on smooth surfaces)
  • Quicker pond refill than single pack paints
  • Coverage of 6-8 m2 per litre
  • Comes in recyclable packaging

DO NOT APPLY IN TEMPERATURES LOWER THAN 10°C OR OVER 25°C

Prep your pond: Make sure the surface is clean and dry and free of any imperfections/cracks etc. Should you find any cracks fill where appropriate with Gold Label Pond & Aquarium Sealer. For large cracks V out the crack to approximately 10mm, make sure the surface to be bonded is solid & dust free, prime the surface with PVA (follow manufacturer’s instructions), then fill with Gold Label Pond & Aquarium Sealer.

Prep the paint: Please note: Although Gold Label Pond Paint is much safer than normal resin systems; it is recommended you should avoid contact by using a barrier cream or gloves. Please find the link to our gloves here. Any splashes should be washed off with soap and water.

  • Your paint comes in 2 sections, the hardener in the top and the paint in the bottom. Prior to adding the hardener, thoroughly stir the paint. Add the hardener to the paint in the bottom pot and mix thoroughly for a minimum of 2 minutes (VERY IMPORTANT). Once mixed, the paint is usable for around 1.5 hours in ambient temperatures. (Over 20°c the timing will be reduced.)
  • Once mixed, apply the paint by brush, roller or spray, ensuring that the coating reaches all corners, nooks & crannies etc. Apply a minimum of 2 coats (the 2nd coat can be applied once the 1st coat is touch dry (approx. 6-8 hours at 20°c) This applies to any subsequent coats). The paint will cure hard in 12 hours, and fully cure in 3-7 days depending on atmospheric conditions. Once fully cured, wash the surface completely and allow to drain before refilling to use once again. B: Leave for 24 hours and if there is any residue on the surface, skim off before adding any livestock.

This means it is also less toxic than traditional pond paints.  It has coverage of 6-8 m2 which also means with 2 coats used (on smooth rendered concrete) it is far more cost effective than the typical pond paints out there. With a second coat application time of 6-48 hours and such ease of application, professional pond builders are choosing Gold Label Pond Paint every time! It comes in a variety of colours and sizes, is easy to mix and apply, and dries after 6-8 hours (full cure 3-7 days). The paint also works on other surfaces such as: blocks, brick, tiles, fibreglass and plastic. It should last approximately 5-10 years, giving you a fresh look to your water tight pond for years to come!

  • No Primer Needed
  • Works on damp surfaces
  • Easy to apply with brush, roller or spray.
  • Water based, therefore easier to clean & less toxic.
  • 2 coats only (on smooth surfaces)
  • Quicker pond refill than single pack paints
  • Coverage of 6-8 m2 per litre
  • Comes in recyclable packaging

DO NOT APPLY IN TEMPERATURES LOWER THAN 10°C OR OVER 25°C

Prep your pond: Make sure the surface is clean and dry and free of any imperfections/cracks etc. Should you find any cracks fill where appropriate with Gold Label Pond & Aquarium Sealer. For large cracks V out the crack to approximately 10mm, make sure the surface to be bonded is solid & dust free, prime the surface with PVA (follow manufacturer’s instructions), then fill with Gold Label Pond & Aquarium Sealer. 

Prep the paint: Please note: Although Gold Label Pond Paint is much safer than normal resin systems; it is recommended you should avoid contact by using a barrier cream or gloves. Please find the link to our gloves here. Any splashes should be washed off with soap and water.

  • Your paint comes in 2 sections, the hardener in the top and the paint in the bottom. Prior to adding the hardener, thoroughly stir the paint. Add the hardener to the paint in the bottom pot and mix thoroughly for a minimum of 2 minutes (VERY IMPORTANT). Once mixed, the paint is usable for around 1.5 hours in ambient temperatures. (Over 20°c the timing will be reduced.)
  • Once mixed, apply the paint by brush, roller or spray, ensuring that the coating reaches all corners, nooks & crannies etc. Apply a minimum of 2 coats (the 2nd coat can be applied once the 1st coat is touch dry (approx. 6-8 hours at 20°c) This applies to any subsequent coats). The paint will cure hard in 12 hours, and fully cure in 3-7 days depending on atmospheric conditions. Once fully cured, wash the surface completely and allow to drain before refilling to use once again. B: Leave for 24 hours and if there is any residue on the surface, skim off before adding any livestock.

name: Impermax Pur Cat 1ltr
description_text: Impermax is a single component, high performance waterproofing material, based on Polyurethane, certified according to EEC Directive 98/83/CE, and which can be in direct contact with drinking water for human consumption. It can easily be applied on different kinds of surfaces used in hydraulic infrastructures such as concrete, mortar, ceramics, fibreglass, reinforced polyester, etc. Curing time: 4-6 hours (in the summer), 12-24 hours (in the winter). Not suited for PP or PE. Apply at least 3-4 layers to obtain a membrane thickness of 1.5 to 1.9mm (2 kilo per m^2). It is recommended to use humidity primer in most situations.
