name: Small Tin of Solvent Weld Glue (240ml)
description_text:
Extremely fast setting, low VOC PVC cement for all classes and schedules with interference fit through 6″ (160 mm) diameter, Schedule 80 through 4″ (110 mm) diameter. Premium formula for wet conditions and/or quick pressurization.

Suitable for irrigation, plumbing, and pool & spa applications. Can be used without primer on non-pressure systems if local codes permit.

name: Large Tin of Solvent Weld Glue (500ml)
description_text:
Extremely fast setting, low VOC PVC cement for all classes and schedules with interference fit through 6″ (160 mm) diameter, Schedule 80 through 4″ (110 mm) diameter. Premium formula for wet conditions and/or quick pressurization.

Suitable for irrigation, plumbing, and pool & spa applications. Can be used without primer on non-pressure systems if local codes permit.

name: Griffon WDF-05 250ml (fast dry)
description_text:
Solvent cement for joining PVC and ABS (flexible) tubes, coupling sleeves and fittings in pressure and drainage up to diameter 160 mm.

Maximum pressure 16 bar for PVC (PN16) and 5 bar for ABS (PN5).


  • Suitable for Wet and Dry Conditions (not under water)
  • Extremely fast drying. For PVC and ABS
  • Gap filling (max. 0,8mm)
  • For Flexible tubes (hoses) and Swimming Pool Installations
  • Brush included. According to European standard EN 14814

name: Griffon UNI-100 250ml (hard pipe only)
description_text:
Thixotrope hard pvc-glue, suited for hard PVC pipes and valves in both pressure and drainage. Griffon Uni 100 has gap filling capabilities
and is also suited for roof gutters. Complete product information is available on demand. Pressure filling capacity max. 0,2
mm. Gap filling capacity max. 0,8 mm.

name: Aquaforte X45 spray polyesterv. 500ml
description_text:
AquaForte Spraybond X45 Premium is a very high quality heat-resistant carbon/pu based contact adhesive for the adhesion of various liners on any surface.

Properties: 

  • Very fast
  • Heat resistant
  • Extremely powerful
  • Fast drying
  • For universal use
  • Ready to use
  • DCM Free.

Areas of application: For gluing all types of surfaces. Thanks for the high solids and rubber content, this adhesive is extremely strong and safe to use. AquaForte Spraybond X45 is also suitable for gluing surfaces sensitive to plasticisers such as PVC. The amount of plasticiser in the PVC must not exceed 16%. Testing is recommended before use.

name: Oase UniFix + 290 ml
description_text:
The power glue with maximum adhesive force - even under water. The high-performance film adhesive UniFix + can be used universally because it not only bonds the OASE pond films made of EPDM, rubber or PVC. Its enormous adhesive force is particularly evident on a wide variety of surfaces, such as stone, metal or plastic. The adhesive cartridge contains 290 ml and should be used up within one year. You can be sure: UniFix keeps what it promises.

  • High performance universal adhesive for a wide variety of liners and substrates.
  • 290 ml cartridge

Technical Data

Dimensions (L x W) mm 220 x 50
Net weight kg 0.52
Application Primer and activation of EPDM liners
Dimensions (L x W x H) mm 220 x 50 x 220
Volume 290 ml

name: 6-12ft Extendable Handle
description_text:
These allumiunium handles have a twist and lock fitting which allows the user to lock the extention at the desired length. They have a universal (two hole) click fit end which fits a
wide range of heads such as- Norfine nets, leaf nets, vacuum heads etc. (most heads fit
these poles)

name: Deep Leaf Net Scoop - with Aluminium back (Fits extendable handles)
description_text: Clean away leaves and debris from your pond or pool with thisdeep net, featuring an  aluminium back for added support to avoid bending and breaking.

name: Oase Pond-O-Vac 4
description_text:
The constant and powerful performance of the pond and pool vacuum has proven itself. With 1700 watts of full power and a maximum suction depth of 2.4m, the PondoVac 4 cleans all kinds of ponds, pools and the household as a wet vacuum cleaner. The highlight is the patented dirt collection system, in which the container is filled and emptied at the same time. This enables you to vacuum without interruption. The suction power can be individually adjusted using a hand controller. Comfortable vacuuming possible to a depth of 2m. Thanks to transport rollers and adjustable handles, the PondoVac 4 can be easily moved to the desired location. The scope of delivery also includes 4 aluminum tubes, 1 transparent suction tube, 5 attachments for cleaning various floors, a dirt collection bag, a 5 m long suction hose and a 2.5 m long drainage hose. Proven OASE quality.

  • Vacuum non stop thanks to the patented two chamber system - simultaneous vacuuming and emptying of the tank
  • Maximum suction depth of 2.4 m thanks to high performance 1,700 W motor with optimized blade geometry
  • Can be used for cleaning garden ponds, pools and swim ponds as well as a wet vacuum in the household
  • Transparent suction tube for flow through control
  • Easy to move with transport rollers and adjustable handle
  • Hand regulator for adjusting the suction power
  • Included in the scope of delivery: Four robust aluminum tubes, special string algae nozzle, broadened universal nozzle, area nozzle, wet suction brush, brush nozzle, debris collection bag, 5 m long suction hose and 2.5 m long discharge hose.
  • Suction capacity up to 83 l / min, depending on the implementation conditions

Technical Data

Dimensions (L x W x H) mm 435 x 395 x 670
Rated voltage 230 V / 50 Hz
Power consumption W. 1700
Power cable length m 4.00
Net weight kg 13.10
Limited warranty Years 2 + 1
Suction depth max. m 2.40
Max. Flow rate l / h 5000
Length, suction hose m 5.00
Length, discharge hose m 2.50
Floating hose application Not possible

name: 25cm x 23cm Small Leaf Nets (1mtr wooden handle)
Deep Leaf Net Scoop (Fits extendable handles)
description_text: Clean away leaves and debris from your pond or pool with this deep net.

name: Oase Pond-O-Vac Classic
description_text:
The PondoVac Classic is suitable for effective sludge removal by means of a powerful 1400 W motor. It contains fully automatic activation and emptying by intelligent motor electronics. The PondoVac Classic impresses with its compact design with a 27 l tank and powerful suction up to a depth of 1.5 m. The scope of delivery includes 4 different suction nozzles: crevice nozzle, algae nozzle, flat nozzle with rubber lip and variable universal nozzle (2 - 10 mm), including 4 m suction and 2 m drain hose.

  • Suction capacity up to 3000 l / h, depending on the implementation conditions
  • Automatic activation and emptying through clever motor control
  • Silt removal through powerful 1,400 W motor
  • Compact design with 27 l wastewater tank
  • Transparent suction tube for flow through control
  • Maximum suction depth of 2 m
  • Included in the scope of delivery: 4 suction pipes, 4 different suction nozzles (see details), 1 filter bag, 1 coarse debris collection sack and 4 m suction hose and 2 m drain hose

Technical Data

Dimensions (L x W x H) mm 370 x 370 x 580
Rated voltage 220 - 240 V / 50 Hz
Power consumption W. 1400
Power cable length m 4.00
Net weight kg 9.50
Limited warranty Years 2
Suction depth max. m 2.00
Max. Flow rate l / h 3000
Length, suction hose m 4.00
Length, discharge hose m 2.00
Floating hose application Not possible

name: Oase Pond-O-Vac 5
description_text:
The powerful pond vacuum cleaner PondoVac 5 works as a combination of suction turbine and feed pump. The brother of the PondoVac 4 has identical pipes and nozzles, but is much more powerful in comparison. In comparison, it offers 60% more delivery capacity. Its suction power is 8000 l / h. It also pumps wastewater over height differences and is therefore also ideally suited for difficult terrain. The PondoVac 5 is presented in a new color scheme and is extremely mobile and quiet thanks to its "big wheel" design with rubber coating. A swimming hose set with 10 meters of hose (38 mm) and a suitable telescopic rod is optionally available for him.

  • Vacuum without interruption thanks to integrated emptying pump
  • Flexible use - waste water can be diverted in any direction.
  • Pumps the waste water even over height differentials
  • Maximum suction depth of 2.5 m thanks to high performance 1700 W motor with optimized blade geometry
  • Can be used for cleaning garden ponds, pools and swim ponds as well as a wet vacuum in the household
  • Transparent suction tube for flow through control
  • Easy to move with transport rollers and adjustable handle
  • More ground clearance and silent tires in big wheel design
  • Hand regulator for adjusting the suction power
  • Discharge hose with C-connection on both sides
  • Included in the scope of delivery: Four robust aluminum tubes, special string algae nozzle, broadened universal nozzle, area nozzle, wet suction brush, brush nozzle, debris collection bag, 5 m long suction hose and 2.5 m long discharge hose.

Technical Data

Dimensions (L x W x H) mm 436 x 425 x 716
Rated voltage 230 V / 50 Hz
Power consumption W. 1700
Power consumption pump W. 900
Power cable length m 7.50
Net weight kg 24.40
Limited warranty Years 2 + 1
Suction depth max. m 2.50
Max. Flow rate l / h 8000

Length, discharge hose m 10.00

name: 8-16ft Extendable Handle
description_text:
These allumiunium handles have a twist and lock fitting which allows the user to lock the
extension at the desired length. They have a universal (two hole) click fit end which fits a
wide range of heads such as- Norfine nets, leaf nets, vacuum heads etc. (most heads fit
these poles)

name: Aquaforte Prime Biopool robot
description_text:
A new era in cleaning a swimming pond and biopool has begun! Zodiac’s best robot cleaner is now available for biopools and swimming ponds. The 4 WD robot is equipped with a special 400μ cartridge for larger organic dirt particles. The robot has an extra wide suction opening of 24 centimeters for easy suction. The transparent window makes it clear to see how full the filter cartridge is. The Biopool robot is a four-wheel drive robot. Thanks to the patented “Lift System”, the robot is easy to remove from the water. The robot releases all its water before it is lifted from the swimming pond. Other specifications of this unique robot:

  • Sensor Nav System™: This allows the robot to study the dimensions of the swimming pond or biopool for the best and fastest cleaning result.
  • Ultra powerful filter performance: thanks to the patented Cyclone suction.
  • Ease of use: less chance of cable confusion thanks to the improved swivel and gyroscope and patented lift system.
  • Communication: control over the robot with the iAquaLink APP.

name: Aquaforte Pond Vacuum (Wet & Dry)
description_text: 4 in 1: Pond & Pool cleaning, Wet & Dry Vacuum cleaner. 35 Liter content. Wheels for easy transport. Fully automatic operation for draining. 1400 Watt, Size 36 x 36 x 60 cm. Comes with 3 suction heads, 4 m suction hose and 1,5 m discharge hose. Maximum suction height 2 m. Supplied with 4 suction pipes of 50cm of which 2 are transparent.

name: Professional GRP telescopic pole L =3.6 to 10.3m
description_text:
Professional pool/pond vacuum cleaner for maintenance without delay! Due to the submersible pump in the bottom of the unit, the incoming water will be continuously pumped out to waste. The incoming water is pre-filtered through a fine mesh filter bag to separate leaves, algae, small twigs, pebbles, substrate, etc. This filter bag is easy to remove and has a large zipper for fast cleaning. The water passing this filter mesh bag will be pumped out with the 900 watt dirty water submersible pump to waste or to a finer filter (like a sieve filter, drumfilter, fleece filter or other) when water loss is not desirable. The waste hose is fitted with a professional (fibreglass reinforced) Storz coupling. Draining capacity is ±7m³/h.

Due to the powerful 1400 watt suction turbine the vacuum cleaner can be used up to 2,5 meter depth. The stable hand grip and large wheels facilitate easy transport around the pond. Total weight is 19 kg. The Vacuum Cleaner XL is the only pond cleaner in its class that has the GS (Gepr™‚¼fte Sicherheit) certificate.

The Vacuum Cleaner XL comes with telescopic pole (1,5 - 4,5 mtr) and a universal (transparent) suction nozzle. The suction hose and discharge hose are separately available in 5 or 10 meter. Special substrate/gravel suction heads as well as a triangular shaped suction head are separately available.

The Vacuum Cleaner XL comes with telescopic pole (1,5 - 4,5 mtr) and a universal (transparent) suction nozzle and bottom cleaner and 10m hose.

name: AquaForte Pond Vacuum wet & dry PRO version
description_text: New pond vacuum for pond maintenance without delay! Equipped with an internal dirty water submersible pump that continuously discharges the suctioned water. The suctioned water is first passed through a closable pre-filter bag so that leaves, algae, twigs, stones, substrate, etc. are captured. This very easily removable bag is easily opened with a coarse-toothed zipper for cleaning. The water passing through the filter bag is discharged to the sewer by the internal dirty water submersible pump or pumped to a finer filter (e.g. a sieve filter, drum filter or fleece filter) when water loss is not desirable. Standard 32 or 38mm poolflex hose can be used as waste hose! This makes it very easy and affordable to work with self-determined lengths of waste hose! The 1200 watt powerful suction turbine allows suction to a depth of 2.5 meters. The submersible pump has a separate plug so the suction can also be used only for dry vacuuming without discharging the water. Tank volume: 35 liters. Cable length: 4 meters. Supplied including: 3 suction attachments, 4 m suction hose, 4 suction tubes (2 transparent, 2 black) of 50 cm each, and 1.2 m waste hose.

description_text: for use with Aquaforte Pond Vacuum (Wet & Dry) .

name: Vacuum head for use with high pressure-washers
description_text:
A great invention that turns every standard high pressure washer into a
professional pond vacuum cleaner! Function: the cleaner creates a strong
back pressure by means of a special nozzle. This back pressure will take out
sludge and other sediments on the bottom but does not take out substrates,
lava, gravel, plants, etc.! The cleaner has a brush to scrub off algae.
Standard "pool click" system for telescope handles. Hose connection is
40mm. A great advantage, when compared to vacuum cleaners with a build
in pump, is that this cleaner can be held above the water level again and
again without losing the suction power (see photo). Because of the high
pressure it is recommended to use a strong quality suction/pressure hose on
the waste side, like the listed hoses in the table. Pressure hose connection is
the standard M22 (male threaded).

name: Round gravel/subtrate head
description_text:
Professional pool/pond vacuum cleaner for maintenance without delay! Due to the submersible pump in the bottom of the unit, the incoming water will be continuously pumped out to waste. The incoming water is pre-filtered through a fine mesh filter bag to separate leaves, algae, small twigs, pebbles, substrate, etc. This filter bag is easy to remove and has a large zipper for fast cleaning. The water passing this filter mesh bag will be pumped out with the 900 watt dirty water submersible pump to waste or to a finer filter (like a sieve filter, drumfilter, fleece filter or other) when water loss is not desirable. The waste hose is fitted with a professional (fibreglass reinforced) Storz coupling. Draining capacity is ±7m³/h.

Due to the powerful 1400 watt suction turbine the vacuum cleaner can be used up to 2,5 meter depth. The stable hand grip and large wheels facilitate easy transport around the pond. Total weight is 19 kg. The Vacuum Cleaner XL is the only pond cleaner in its class that has the GS (Gepr™‚¼fte Sicherheit) certificate.

The Vacuum Cleaner XL comes with telescopic pole (1,5 - 4,5 mtr) and a universal (transparent) suction nozzle. The suction hose and discharge hose are separately available in 5 or 10 meter. Special substrate/gravel suction heads as well as a triangular shaped suction head are separately available.

name: M22 female threaded socket (25mm) for high pressure head
description_text:
A great invention that turns
every standard high pressure
washer into a professional
pond vacuum cleaner!
Function: the cleaner creates a strong back pressure by means of a
special nozzle. This back pressure will take out sludge and other
sediments on the bottom but does not take out substrates, lava,
gravel, plants, etc.! The cleaner has a brush to scrub off algae.
Standard ‚‚¦pool click‚‚½ system for telescope handles. Hose connection
is 40mm. A great advantage, when compared to vacuum cleaners with
a build in pump, is that this cleaner can be held above the water level
again and again without losing the suction power (see photo).
Because of the high pressure it is recommended to use a strong
quality pressure hose on the waste side, like the listed hoses in the
table. Pressure hose connection is a standard M22 (male threaded).

name: 29" Norfine Net Head
description_text: This 29" Norfine Net Head is perfect for daily use. Its high-quality construction and durable material ensure long-lasting and effective performance. With a 29" size, it provides ample coverage and efficiency in catching fish. Trust the expertise of Norfine Nets to enhance your fishing experience!

name: Koi Pro 80cm head with 3m Aluminium Handle
description_text: The Koi Pro 80cm head with 3m Aluminium Handle is made specifically for Koi, with a lightweight, durable construction that minimizes damage to their fins. The two-part handle and included case make it easy to transport and store. A must-have for any Koi enthusiast.

name: 90cm Norfine Net Head (Heavy Duty)
description_text:
90cm diameter koi pan net head with click fitting. The frame is made from 1/2″ diameter aluminium tube.

6mm hexmesh netting.

name: Koi Pro 60cm head with 2.5m Aluminium Handle
description_text: Specially designed for Koi enthusiasts, the Koi-Pro head features a lightweight and durable construction to minimize damage to their fins. With a 60cm head and 2.5m Aluminium Handle, this essential tool is easy to transport, store, and use on your beloved Koi.

name: 100cm Norfine Net Head (Heavy Duty)
description_text:
100cm diameter koi pan net head with click fitting. The frame is made from 1/2″ diameter aluminium tube.

6mm hexmesh netting.

name: Aquaforte Garden Sniper
description_text:
Motion activated sprinkler will startle and scare off animals with a short squirt of
water. Do not use in case of frost. Runs on a 9V battery (not included).

name: Heron Stop Reflector
description_text:
The heron scarer utilises the same predatory eye method as used by Nasa for clearing birds for rocket take-off areas.

  • Clever design imitates a predators eye
  • Reflective, polished surface deters herons
  • Quick & easy to install & anchor to pond bed
  • Manufactured from metalized polycarbonate
  • 18cm Diameter

name: Heron Stop spinner
description_text:
Velda Wind Spinner is very simple to install, heron stop spinner protects your fish pond
by scaring herons and other birds from your pond and/or garden. It has a picture of the
eye of a bird of prey in its centre, and is made of shiny metal which will reflect the light
also scaring away any predators.


Can also be used as a pigeon scarer, hanging on a nylon string, thus forming a decorative
element as well.


Features:
- No maintenance required
- Stainless steel construction for long life
- Includes multi-piece mounting rod and stake
- Approx size: 20cm diameter

description_text:
Aquasafe weatherproof cable connectors are ideal for use in the associated cabling for domestic and commercial applications, such as outside lighting, heating and other garden appliances.

Aquasafe provides a safe and reliable connection in a range of demanding outdoor applications in public places and is especially suitable for regular unplugging in a permanent or temporary location - such as displays and exhibitions, signage, decorative lighting, ponds, garages, workshops, traffic signals etc.

name: K-Koi 4-Way Switch Box
description_text:
One of the switches is rated to 1,800 watts and the remaining three are rated up to 500 watts each. The maximum current handling for the unit overall is 3,300 watts. All four switches are individually fused. It is supplied with a self locking wall mounting bracket, wall plugs and screws, so no holes have to be made in the main unit ensuring its water tight integrity. It also come with cable gland blanking plugs to seal unused outlets. Colour coded cable glands and switches enable rapid identification and simple installation. Each switch has its own illuminated indicator to let you know which appliances are on. The unit readily accepts cable sizes from 7mm to 12mm.

  • For ponds, boats, gardens etc.
  • Illuminated Switch indicators
  • Four separately fused circuits
  • IP66 & CE Approved
  • Mains power on indicator
  • Designed for use up to 3.3KW
  • Colour coded for ease of use
  • Unique wall mounting bracket
  • Switch life of over 50,000 cycles

description_text:
The LED underwater spotlight LunAqua Classic LED Set 3 is suitable for use above and under water (protection class IP 68) and sets pleasantly warm white light accents. It is particularly energy-efficient with only 1 watt power consumption (multiple LED) and contains an adjustable head for flexible alignment of the beam angle.

name: OASE LunAqua Power LED Set 3
description_text:
The LunAqua Power LED brings a lot of light and is also energy-saving. The small, compact spotlight with robust IP68 connection technology is one of the brightest in our pond lighting range. At the same time, it needs significantly less energy. With a power consumption of just 5.8 watts, it shines as brightly as a 50 watt incandescent lamp. The excellent heat management gives the LED light source a long service life. On top of that, the spotlight impresses with its flexible application options: as fountain lighting, in the ground installation with a ground spike or in wall mounting. Of course, the lights, drivers and cables are suitable for permanent underwater use. LunAqua Power LED is available as Set 1 or Set 3, which can be expanded to up to 4 lights per driver.

name: Blagdon Powersafe Plug and Socket
description_text:
The Blagdon Powersafe Outdoor Plug and Socket Connector is specifically designed for safe pond side and garden electrical connections. The weather-proof connection is IP56 standard with a total capacity of 2200 Watts and is easily attached to a Blagdon Powersafe switchbox. It is ideal for interchangeable additional items wired to plugs e.g. power tools, radios and lawn trimmers. The plug has been designed to work with circular smooth sheathed cables only. The cable glands supplied allow fitting of cables between 4mm-9mm in diameter. Use the smallest suitable gland size. It features an integrated live socket blanking cap/tool with ergonomic design. Over half a century of fish keeping and water gardening knowledge are brought together in the product so you can be assured of a successful, creative water garden.

 

  • Designed for safe pond side and garden electrical connections
  • 2200 Watt total capacity
  • Fits 4mm-9mm cables
  • Integrated live socket blanking cap/tool with ergonomic design

name: InScenio FM Master EGC Cloud
description_text:
The revolution in garden tool control - the heart of the OASE Control System. From now on, you can use your smartphone or tablet (iOS or Android) to conveniently control and regulate your gardening equipment in an app via WiFi. As soon as interesting updates are available, there is automatic information about the free download. The 4 sockets can be controlled over 24 hours using a timer. The device can now also be integrated into the home network via a router and also easily networked with the OASE Cloud. In this way, the connected devices can also be monitored and controlled while on the go. The connection and bi-directional communication of OASE end devices with OASE Control technology is also possible. In addition, a further 10 OASE devices (radio-controlled or with an OASE Control connection) can be controlled via the app. Including splash protection. A ground spike for secure anchoring is included in the scope of delivery.

  • Revolutionary device control in the garden via WiFi, with tablet, or a smart phone
  • Connection option for EGC-capable end devices (e.g. AquaMax Eco Expert)
  • With radio remote control for up to 10 remote controllable OASE devices
  • Globally accessible free-of-charge via the OASE Cloud
  • Easy to connect with the OASE Cloud. Doing so allows the connected devices to be managed and controlled on the move
  • Ground stake guarantees secure anchoring in the ground
  • Innovative highlight of the OASE InScenio Power Management family, controllable via WiFi on tablets or Smartphones (iOS or Android)
  • Simply download the app (from the Apple Store or via Google Play) and get started
  • With 4 power outlets: 3 can be switched on and off, and the 4th is dimmable
  • Each power outlet can be controlled over 24 hours with integrated timer
  • With additional EGC connection for connecting to EGC-compatible OASE end devices
  • In addition, up to 10 remote-controlled or EGC OASE devices can be integrated and controlled via the app
  • All-year round use with spray water resistant power outlets
  • System requirements: iOS 12.0 (Apple) or Android version 5.0 or later is required to run the app on mobile devices.

name: EGC Garden Controller Cloud
description_text:
The innovation in garden equipment control - controls the OASE Control technology with an app and a click. You can conveniently control and regulate your devices with the OASE Control app using WiFi on your smartphone (iOS or Android). The controller can be easily connected to the home network. An additional advantage is the location-independent monitoring option. The optional connection to the free OASE Cloud means that the connected devices can also be monitored and controlled while on the move. Garden and pond owners are immediately notified by email and push notifications in the event of faults or abnormalities. The controller enables the connection and bi-directional communication of end devices with OASE Control technology. Includes splash protection. The scope of delivery includes a ground spike for secure anchoring and fastening material for wall mounting.

  • CLOUD-COMPATIBLE: Accessible worldwide via the free OASE cloud (InScenio Controller Cloud)
  • OASE CONTROL: Up to 10 OASE-controlled devices (pumps, filters, light) can be connected, controlled and monitored
  • ALL YEAR ROUND: The housing is protected against splashing water (IP68) and can be operated outdoors all year round
  • INCLUDED: Flexible mounting material for wall mounting or peg mounting included in the set
  • APP CONTROL​: Simply download the OASE Control app (App Store or Play Store), register and get started
  • SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: iOS 12.5 (Apple) or Android version 9 or newer is required to operate the app on mobile devices

name: OASE LunAqua Power LED XL 3000 Spot
description_text:
The new generation for natural light is called LunAqua Power LED XL 3000 Spot. With this powerful spotlight system, you can turn your garden into a stage: high-quality LEDs, which shine for up to 50,000 hours, set the scene for bodies of water or plants permanently and energy-efficiently with just 15 watts. The large spotlight floods individual garden areas with light or sets effective accents, especially on water fountains and trees. 1,250 lumens make the spotlight one of the brightest in the range. A colour temperature of 3,000 Kelvin provides warm light colours that create an atmospheric glow even from water depths of up to 4 m. Robust underwater connection technology and safe 24-volt DC low voltage make such applications "with depth" permanently watertight. So opt for this flexible and expandable system that always gives you the choice: it can be installed above or under water and can be used to realise individual lighting ideas with a 15° beam angle.

  • INDIVIDUAL: Available in four different beam angles (narrow spot, spot, flood, wide flood)
  • COLOUR TONES: A colour temperature of 3000 Kelvin is well suited to showcasing red objects; lights with 4000 Kelvin are particularly suitable for emphasising green tones (bamboo, hedges, etc.)
  • DURABLE: The excellent thermal management and the high LED quality enable a service life of more than 50,000 hours
  • INCLUDED: 1 spotlight with 5 m cable and 1 peg
  • THOUGHT OF EVERYTHING?: Accessories required for an immediate start: LunAqua Power LED Driver with connection possibilities for up to four spotlights (2x LunAqua Power LED XL or 1x LunAqua Power LED XL and 2x LunAqua Power LED or 4x LunAqua Power LED)
  • ROBUST: Spotlights, drivers and cables can be safely used in water up to 4 m deep (in accordance with standards, it is not possible to use the driver underwater in swimming ponds)

name: Oase LunAqua Connect M RGB Solo
description_text:
For timelessly beautiful moments in the garden: the LunAqua Connect M Solo RGB Spot creates the right atmosphere in the garden. It bathes taller bushes up to 2 m, trees up to 5 m as well as ponds and garden decorations in coloured light and can be controlled via the controller and OASE Switch app. It also provides garden sheds and buildings with colourful outdoor light. The spotlight can be positioned permanently above or under water using a base or ground spike (IP68 protection rating for the luminaire, IP67 cable connection for temporary submersion, e.g. during a rain shower or for burying). The modular, expandable LunAqua Connect 24 V garden lighting system can be supplemented with additional lights and various extension cables at any time. These are available in three sizes in white as well as an RGB version for colour accents. A controller and power supply unit are required to use the 7.5 W RGB light.

  • UNIVERSAL LIGHTING SYSTEM: For gardens and ponds IP68 spotlights and IP67 connection technology for use in flower beds, along hedges, for ponds and water features
  • EXCELLENT LIGHT QUALITY: A high colour rendering index (CRI) of over 90 ensures a natural, intense light pattern with rich colours
  • SMART: Dimming, setting time scenarios or selecting colours – all simple using the LunAqua Connect OASE Switch controller and OASE Switch app via smartphone or tablet
  • OUTSTANDING PRODUCT DESIGN: Light-resistant surface and clever installation properties such as a weighted base with screw holes, height adjustment extender and adjustable head
  • RGB, WHITE OR BOTH!: RGB and white lights in one system controllable via OASE Switch controller and app (two strands white, one strand RGB per controller)
  • FLEXIBLE, EXPANDABLE SYSTEM: Easy to install and can be retrofitted at any time with 3 m cable on the spotlight and optional 5 m extension cable, 10 m cable with 3 outlets and 3-way distributor for white and RGB spotlights
  • SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: A LunAqua Connect OASE Switch controller is required to use the OASE Switch functions
  • WITH OR WITHOUT CONTROLLER: White spotlights can be operated directly from the power supply unit or can also be controlled smartly using the controller and OASE Switch app

name: Oase Water Jet Lightning
description_text:
Like a rainbow of water - the water jet of the Water Jet Lightning looks so bright and graceful, the colors of which can vary between red, yellow and blue. The changing colors, beam widths of up to 1.8 m and beam heights of up to 0.9 m are recorded in preset programs that you can conveniently select up to 80 m using the remote control. If you prefer a fixed color instead of changing colors, this can be fixed without any problems. With its robust stainless steel base, the Water Jet Lightning fits very flexibly on any surface in any garden - its color-water games really come into their own in small water areas as well as in swimming ponds. The complete set of Water Jet Lightning in a double pack, external control, transformer and cable as well as the clever "Plug'n'Spray" Concept make it particularly easy for you to set up and connect. Convincing OASE quality, because you receive a total of up to 3 years guarantee - 2 plus 1 year requirement guarantee.

  • Luminous, colored, water arches for a special charm in the garden
  • Variations of jet lengths, jet height, and RGB colors can be displayed using the pre-set programs
  • The programs can be selected via remote control from a distance of up to 80 m
  • The water jet angle can be individually adjusted
  • Easily set your favorite color for the water arch
  • High quality stainless steel base, can be bolted onto different substrates
  • Maximum jet length 1.8 m, maximum jet height 0.9 m
  • Can be connected to a timer
  • "Plug 'n' Spray" principle enables easy installation
  • Low maintenance

name: Oase Lunaqua Power LED XL Wide Flood 4000
description_text:
The new generation for natural light is called LunAqua Power LED XL 4000 Wide Flood. With this powerful spotlight system you turn your garden into a stage: high-quality LEDs, which light up for up to 50,000 hours, put bodies of water or plants in the limelight permanently and with only 15 watts of energy. The large spotlight floods individual garden areas with light or sets effective accents, especially on water fountains and trees. 1,350 lumens make the headlight one of the brightest in the range. A color temperature of 4,000 Kelvin ensures pleasant light colors that radiate atmospherically from up to 4 m water depth. Robust underwater connection technology and safe 24 volt DC low voltage make such operations "with depth" permanently watertight.

  • Perfect illumination for any lighting situation
  • Flexible, extensible system that is suited for installation underwater and above water: The user decides!

name: Pro-Line Aqua Auto Top-Up System
description_text:
The Pro-Line Aqua Auto Top-up system is installed with a simple float mechanism with waterline mark. When the  water level in your pond drops below the set level the unit will let mains water through and continue to fill the pond until the water level is back up to the desired set point.


The system comes complete and consists of:

  • Water level sensor
  • 2 x "Click fit" hose connectors
  • Control box
  • Low voltage power supply
  • Water tight connection for power
categories: Water Purifiers And Auto Top Up Systems

name: Evolution Aqua 12 Inch Detox Dechlorinator
description_text:
The Evolution Aqua Detox Dechlorinator is a quick and simple method of filtering out harmful chlorine and other impurities from tap water. It is ideal for first fill, water changes and top-ups, for both ponds and aquariums.

There's no need to wait for chlorine to gas-off or to use liquid treatments. Simply fill up straight from the hosepipe via the Evolution Aqua Detox Dechlorinator. This unit simply connects to garden hose or rigid pipe work. Connectors are included.

Hi-grade activated carbon removes chlorine, chloramine, bromine, malachite green, dyes, colours, humic acids, organics, proteins, antibiotics, hormones and ozone.

New and improved for 2017 with high capacity carbon for optimum chlorine removal.
Recommended flow rate: 4 litres per minute

The 12 inch high-grade activated carbon filter will treat up to*:225,000 Litres / 49,493 U.K. Gallons / 59,439 U.S. Gallons *Maximum treatable water is based on incoming 0.5ppm chlorine.
categories: Water Purifiers And Auto Top Up Systems

name: 10" x 2.5" 5 micron Pre-Filter Cartridge
description_text:
Spun Polypropylene filter cartridges are commonly used due to their superior capacity and efficiency whilst ensuring low pressure drops. This is achieved by a solvent, resin binder and surfactant free construction using nothing but polypropylene, externally finished with thermal bonding.

Our cartridges are characterised by excellent sediment absorption of sand, silt, rust and suspended solids. 

Water purifiers can play a major role in removing unwanted toxins leaving good water quality  in the pond and helping to keep your fish healthy.

name: 10" Carbon Block Cartridge Small
description_text:
Water purifiers can play a major role in removing unwanted toxins leaving good water quality in the pond and helping to keep your fish healthy.

This Carbon cartridge is constructed with solely activated bituminous carbon to provide a good level of efficient filtration for applications in drinking water, reverse osmosis and aquatics.

Carbon blocks are a wide used choice for the reduction and removal of chlorine, VOCs, heavy metals such as lead, mercury, copper, caesium and strontium whilst reducing water hardness. They also improve the taste and odour of drinking water. Supplied water penetrates the block from its outer surface to the core. Removed compounds are held on its surface while purified water passes through to the inside of the block.
categories: Water Purifiers And Auto Top Up Systems

name: Oase In-line Dechlorinator
description_text:
Tap water is thoroughly treated and there for it is ideal for filling ponds and aquariums. However what is safe for humans can be harmful for fish and plants. With this Dechlorinator you are on the safe side; chlorine and heavy metal residues are effectively removed, even during the filling process. To do this the filter is simply connected to off-the-shelf water hoses via the provided quick-release metal couplings. Thus biotope- friendly tap water can be produced quickly and effectively without conditioning in a separate container. 

  • Treats tap water contaminated with chlorine.
  • Immediately binds chlorine and heavy metals.
  • Ideal when topping-up ponds and aquariums.
  • Extremely easy application thanks to ¾" quick-release couplings.

name: Oase ProfiClear Guard Auto Top-up
description_text:
The OASE ProfiClear Guard is an electronically controlled automatic water refill system for maintaining and controlling the water depth in ponds, decorative fountains and water feature reservoirs. The partially submerged water level sensor will inform the controller once a fluctuation in water depth drops below 20mm (3/4"), sending a signal to open the supplied solenoid valve, allowing mains water to flood in to the pond or reservoir. Once the sensor detects that the correct water level has been achieved, the controller will switch the solenoid valve off.

The ProfiClear Guard is particularly useful in Koi Ponds or fish ponds with gravity
fed filter systems as the water level is maintained consistently, regardless of evaporation. Commercial fountain displays which use water level dependent nozzles will also benefit from the top-up system to ensure the correct decorative water display is achieved consistently.

The OASE ProfiClear Guard Set includes:

  • Weatherproof Control Unit with power.
  • Valve open and valve closed indicators.
  • 12 volt water level sensor with 20mm switching differential.
  • Water mains operated, 230 volt Solenoid Valve, supplied with 2m cable.
  • Solenoid Valve inlet and outlet are 1/2‚‚½ BSP female threaded.

name: AquaForte Phospat 3 (2" female) 270gr
description_text:
Phosphate is one of the main nutrients for algae (blanket weed) in a pond. With these filter cartridges it is possible to keep the phosphate level below 0,035 mg/l! This is the "magic" limit that is too low for algae to grow but does not harm plants and bacteria. When the cartridge is saturated it must be replaced (re-filling or regenerating is not possible). A great advantage compared to other phosphate binding products is that the Phospat does not release the phosphate at all! The phosphate binding capacities of the Phospat cartridges is 30-100 times more compared to Iron (III) oxides.

- Reduces phosphate in water and supports the biofilter

- Suitable for ponds, natural pools, fountains and circulation wells

- Adsorption capacity is approximately 90.000 mg (Phospat 1) or 270.000 mg (Phospat 3) phosphate

- Flow rate up to 1100 l/h (Phospat 1) or 3300 l/h (Phospat 3)

- Defined particle size of the individual layers

- Suitable for up to ±50m³ (Phospat 1) or 150m³ (Phospat 3)

- Several PHOSPATs can be combined for larger volumes of water

- The Phospat should be protected against contamination with appropriate pre-filtration

- Max. working pressure: Phospat 1: 6 bar, Phospat 3: 4 ba
categories: Water Purifiers And Auto Top Up Systems

name: 10" X 2.5" SILVER SERIES CARBON BLOCK FILTER
description_text:
This Carbon cartridge is constructed with a mix of coconut shell carbon and activated bituminous carbon to provide a great level of efficient filtration for applications in drinking water, reverse osmosis and aquatics.

Carbon blocks are a wide used choice for the reduction and removal of chlorine, VOCs, heavy metals such as lead, mercury, copper, caesium and strontium whilst reducing water hardness. They also improve the taste and odour of drinking water. Supplied water penetrates the block from its outer surface to the core. Removed compounds are held on its surface while purified water passes through to the inside of the block.
categories: Water Purifiers And Auto Top Up Systems

name: Mountain Tree Spawning Brush for Breeding Double End Loops Dia 15 X 100CM, 2PCS
description_text:
The spawning brush emulates natural koi spawning environment. During the spawning period, koi are sensitive to the environment. Without a comfy, soft home, they may spawn on hard rocks and walls. Thus providing them a comfy home for eggs growth is essential part of success spawning.

  • Soft and resilient filaments, non-toxic, safe for fish egg
  • Stainless steel core can be bent when being used
  • 1 loop or 2 loops at ends optional , easy for installation and maintaining
  • Modest density for collecting fish eggs ensure high survival rate

Comfy Home for Fish Egg Growth

During this special period, koi are sensitive to the environment. Without a comfy, soft home, they may spawn on hard rocks and walls. Meanwhile, touching coarse material in a pond can lead to a risk of injury or unsuccessful spawning.

The Mountain Tree Spawning Brush is made of soft stainless steel coupled with appropriately dense nylon filaments. Fish will feel a smooth, comfortable surface that they can lay eggs on.

name: Viewing Dome Large
description_text:
Dome Diameter: 1 Foot, 6 inches

Dome Height: 1ft

Unit Diameter (inc float): 2 Feet, 2 Inches

Unit Height (inc float): 1 Foot, 8inches

More and more, people are coming to see that pond fish are social animals, and that interaction goes much further than just throwing a handful of feed into the pond and observing the fish. Watching your fish becomes a unique experience with this floating perspex transparent ball in the pond. The fish come and take a peek in the ball regularly, and that produces fantastic images.

Tip: particularly in the early days, you should get the fish interested in the new toy by putting feed into the ball from below. After a while, they will include the ball in their daily route.


Close observation is also an ideal way of checking that your fish are healthy.

name: Koi Viewing sphere Medium
description_text:
Fish Veiwing is a unique experience for pond owners and their freinds with the new
floating see through ball for ponds. Close observation is also useful when checking for
damage or ulcers on your Koi.
*The Medium Sphere measures 36cms across (just the clear part) and the Large sphere
is 46cm across (just the clear part)

name: Nishikigoi Variety Book
description_text:
There are more than 140 different varieties of Koi, and new varieties are being born all the time.

In order for many people around the world to enjoy Koi with peace of mind, we think it is important to have uniform names and standards for the varieties. Therefore, in Japan, the main terms related to Koi, as well as names and definitions of 21 varieties, were established as Japanese Agricultural Standards in February 2022.

In this booklet, in addition to the 21 JAS-established varieties, we have established names and definitions for 129 varieties and systematized each variety in an easy-to-understand manner.

With these unified standards we hope that Koi will be loved all over the world.

For others, who do not intend to visit, it gives vital details of many famous and
not-so-famous Nishikigoi breeders throughout this area which is the undisputed
birthplace of Nishikigoi.

Cloverleaf 2kW Heater Digital Stainless body
description_text:
The New Cloverleaf Pond Heaters are fully EU, TUV & UL approved they are available in two size 1kw & 2 kw.
The Cloverleaf Heaters are very easy to install into new or existing pond setups and come complete with both rigid or flexible pipe connections.
Choose from connection via 19mm, 25mm, 32mm or 38mm flexible pond hose using the 2 hosetails supplied or alternatively the units
will accept 40mm rigid solvent weld or 1.5‚‚½ rigid pressure pipe. These simple easy to use pond heaters have a minimum flow rate of 4000lph
and have a safety low flow shut off switch for peace of mind.
For maximum efficiency and to maintain an ambient temperature the pond should be covered and insulated to help achieve and maintain the
pond temperature in cases of insufficient insulation more KW per gal/litre may be required depending on the level of desired water
temperature.
Two models are available 1Kw - for up to 1000gallons ponds (4500lts) and 2Kw - for up to 2000gallons (9000lts).
Specification;
1kw and 2kw power consumption
4000lph minimum flow rate with pressure switch
Thermostatically controlled
IP55 rated
1.5m cut end cable fitted
Flexi hosetails plus Solvent weld inlet and outlets
length 230cm, width 18.5cm, hight 18.5cm

name: AquaForte Profi Heaters 3Kw With Stat (Stainless)
description_text:
The AquaForte ProfiHeater can be used for heating your pond water. The ProfiHeater is equipped with an adjustable thermostat (up to 40 º C). Both the heating element with temperature sensor and the interior of the housing is made of high grade 316L stainless steel. The ProfiHeater can be connected by means of a hose (Ø 25, 32 and 40 mm) or PVC tube (Ø 50 and 63 mm). Max. pressure: 2 bar.
Includes: 2 hose tails 25/32/40mm and PVC fittings 50/63mm. 230V.

description_text:
These Pro-Line Aqua heaters offer ultimate flexibility in that the element is submersed in the pond water (no added flow restriction) and thermostats can be used independently.

Should either unit fail, they can therefore be replaced individually and systems can be upgraded from 2kw to 3kw using the same thermostat.

Buy with PRO-LINE DIGITAL THERMOSTAT for complete heating system.

Depending on the minerals in the water, minerals may build up on the heating element. Remove these scale build up periodically to ensure optimum heat transfer.
Caution, before you remove the scale build-up be sure to disconnect the control box from the mains and wait at least 30 minutes to let the heating element cool down

name: Remora i-9 Inverter Heat pump (with Wi-Fi)
description_text:
If you are looking for a premium quality heat pump for your pool or Koi pond, with intelligent controls that will maximise heat output and minimise energy consumption and the added benefit of a three year parts and labour warranty for your peace of mind, then look no further than the Remora Inverter.

The Remora Inverter has been designed to be fully responsive to your pool or ponds heating, or cooling needs, Powerful mode delivers the fastest heating, Silent mode offers quiet overnight running and Smart mode automatically and efficiently maintains your desired water temperature.

Electrical connection is easy with the 9kW and 12kW Remora Inverter heat pumps as they come pre-fitted with a mains cable, RCD and plug, making them suitable for use in 13A outdoor sockets, the rest of the Remora Inverter range requires installation by a qualified electrician.

Wi-Fi connectivity comes as standard, meaning you can control your Remora Inverter heat pump from your smart device, even when you are at not home. Still want to use your pool even though the weather is cooler today than expected? Simply go to the Smart Life App and increase the water temperature, no need to even be near your heat pump.

Key features

Wi-Fi

Wi-Fi module supplied as standard, comes with 10m extension cables for improved connectivity (can be easily removed) – requires iOS / Android ‘Smart Life’ App

Intelligent operation

Three preset modes; Powerful mode maintains high heat output for fastest heating, silent mode keeps heat pump below 55% heat output for quietest running, smart mode allows heat pump to use full range of heat output for maximum flexibility and efficiency

Simple connections

9kW and 12kW models come factory fitted with 2.8m mains cable and UK RCD plug suitable for outdoor 13A sockets

1.5 inch female threaded water connections, use the supplied unions for pressure pipe, or you can use optional threaded hose tails for connecting 32mm or 38mm hose

Flexible heating

Heats from 5°C to 40°C, can also be used for cooling

All season model works down to -15°C, automatic hot gas defrosting keeps heat pump working even in minus temperatures

Quality by design

Black ABS weather and corrosion resistant cabinet with covered LCD display

Large heat exchanger for increased efficiency in lower temperatures

High efficiency performance with advanced full DC inverter system that automatically controls the running speed of the compressor and the fan

Low noise airstream design for very quiet operation, average sound level 45 dB(A) at one metre

High quality Toshiba or Mitsubishi compressor (see individual specifications)

EEV (Electronic Expansion Valve) throttling technology adjusts the gas flow and increases COP by up to 20%

Spiral Titanium heat exchanger is 40% more efficient than standard titanium heat exchanger

R32 gas for environmentally friendly operation

Winter cover included as standard (keeps debris out of unit when not in use)

Designed with Koi owners in mind

Heats from 5°C to 40°C

1°C differential to restart (differential below 1°C can affect efficiency)

Factory fitted mains cable on 9kW and 12kW plugs directly into 13A outside socket

10m extension cable on Wi-Fi module for improved connectivity to home Wi-Fi networks (removable if not needed)

Inverter model is suitable for all year round heating / cooling

Large heat exchanger for improved efficiency at lower temperatures

Remote input for external thermostat with probe

name: Remora Proffesional 14 Inverter heat pump (with Wi-Fi)
description_text:
Everything about the Remora Professional says quality, whether it’s the performance, the engineering or the controls – put it all together and you’ve got a heat pump that looks every bit as good as it performs.

Our unique partnership with the manufacturer of our Remora heat pumps allows us to deliver the performance and features our customers want, the result is a range of heat pumps that deliver exceptional COP and heating efficiency, the Remora Professional Inverter range introduces our first 14kW plug and play model and a new 35kW model at the top of the range.

Matching the Remora Professional’s performance, are the highest levels of British quality control and engineering, the powder coated steel case features a cut out fan grill adding to the already sleek and stylish design, the patented, flush fit touch control LCD screen is fully waterproof and requires no additional cover, the full colour display offers precise digital read outs and the heat pump is controllable via Wi-Fi using Smart Life App.

The build quality of the Remora Professional is backed by a four year parts and labour warranty and a ten year warranty of the compressor and heat exchanger (parts only after year four).

The Remora Professional features external control (subject to connection to a suitable Wi-Fi network), allowing remote access to the heat pump for changing parameters and diagnosing running issues, this removes the need for an engineer to attend site or for customers to self-diagnose issues, advanced parameters allow for all aspect of the heat pumps running to be tailored to your requirements.

The full stepless DC Inverter system allows the Remora Professional to be responsive and efficient, choose Boost mode to deliver fast heating, Silent mode for night time running, Eco for the most efficient running or simply leave in Smart mode for intelligent day to day heating or cooling of your pool or pond, all selectable at the touch of a button.

Our 8kW, 10kW and 14kW Remora Professional heat pumps come fitted with mains cable, RCD and plug as standard, making them suitable for outdoor sockets, the other models in the range will require electrical installation by a qualified electrician.

Key features

Four year parts and labour warranty and ten years on compressor and heat exchanger (parts only after year four)

Wi-Fi connectivity built-in – requires iOS / Android ‘Smart Life’ App (requires Wi-Fi network with suitable signal strength)

Preset modes; Boost mode maintains high heat output for fastest heating, Silent mode for night time running, Eco mode for most efficient running and the intelligent Smart mode for maximum flexibility

User-friendly high end touch screen controller, flush fitting colour LCD – watch video

High quality matt finish powder coated galvanised steel casing with integral fan outlet and heat exchanger inlets

8kW, 10kW and 14kW models come fitted with 2.8m mains cable and UK RCD plug

Power usage log shows how much energy has been consumed in each running mode

Advanced Parameters for full control of heat pump settings, running status and fault history

Automatic software update via internet (no need for engineer to callout to update)

External Control allows remote access to diagnostics and parameters for resolving setup issues and potential fault finding

Timer operation and secondary Silent mode timer, ideal for night time running

Heats and cools, set temperature selectable from 5°C to 40°C

Extended season model works down to -15°C, automatic hot gas defrosting

1½ inch / 50mm female glue socket water connections

High efficiency performance with advanced stepless DC inverter system that automatically controls the running speed of the compressor and the fan

Low noise airstream design for very quiet operation, average sound level <30 dB(A) at 10 metres

Stepless twin rotary inverter compressor and DC brushless fan motor

EEV throttling technology adjusts the gas flow and increases COP by up to 20%

Spiral Titanium heat exchanger is 40% more efficient than standard titanium heat exchanger

R32 gas for environmentally friendly operation

Winter cover included (excluding Professional 35)

Remora Professionals are ideally suited to Koi ponds

Wide range of set points from 5°C to 40°C (according to application)

1°C differential to restart

13A RCD plug on 8kW, 10kW and 14kW models allows you to plug units directly into outside sockets without need for additional electrical connections

Inverter model is suitable for all year round heating / cooling

Remote input for external third party thermostatic management

 7.2 ~ 14.5 kW

 4.33 ~ 10.45 kW

name: Remora Proffesional 10 Inverter heat pump (with Wi-Fi)
description_text:
Everything about the Remora Professional says quality, whether it’s the performance, the engineering or the controls – put it all together and you’ve got a heat pump that looks every bit as good as it performs.

Our unique partnership with the manufacturer of our Remora heat pumps allows us to deliver the performance and features our customers want, the result is a range of heat pumps that deliver exceptional COP and heating efficiency, the Remora Professional Inverter range introduces our first 14kW plug and play model and a new 35kW model at the top of the range.

Matching the Remora Professional’s performance, are the highest levels of British quality control and engineering, the powder coated steel case features a cut out fan grill adding to the already sleek and stylish design, the patented, flush fit touch control LCD screen is fully waterproof and requires no additional cover, the full colour display offers precise digital read outs and the heat pump is controllable via Wi-Fi using Smart Life App.

The build quality of the Remora Professional is backed by a four year parts and labour warranty and a ten year warranty of the compressor and heat exchanger (parts only after year four).

The Remora Professional features external control (subject to connection to a suitable Wi-Fi network), allowing remote access to the heat pump for changing parameters and diagnosing running issues, this removes the need for an engineer to attend site or for customers to self-diagnose issues, advanced parameters allow for all aspect of the heat pumps running to be tailored to your requirements.

The full stepless DC Inverter system allows the Remora Professional to be responsive and efficient, choose Boost mode to deliver fast heating, Silent mode for night time running, Eco for the most efficient running or simply leave in Smart mode for intelligent day to day heating or cooling of your pool or pond, all selectable at the touch of a button.

Our 8kW, 10kW and 14kW Remora Professional heat pumps come fitted with mains cable, RCD and plug as standard, making them suitable for outdoor sockets, the other models in the range will require electrical installation by a qualified electrician.

name: Remora i-19 Inverter Heat pump (with Wi-Fi)
description_text:
If you are looking for a premium quality heat pump for your pool or Koi pond, with intelligent controls that will maximise heat output and minimise energy consumption and the added benefit of a three year parts and labour warranty for your peace of mind, then look no further than the Remora Inverter.

The Remora Inverter has been designed to be fully responsive to your pool or ponds heating, or cooling needs, Powerful mode delivers the fastest heating, Silent mode offers quiet overnight running and Smart mode automatically and efficiently maintains your desired water temperature.

Electrical connection is easy with the 9kW and 12kW Remora Inverter heat pumps as they come pre-fitted with a mains cable, RCD and plug, making them suitable for use in 13A outdoor sockets, the rest of the Remora Inverter range requires installation by a qualified electrician.

Wi-Fi connectivity comes as standard, meaning you can control your Remora Inverter heat pump from your smart device, even when you are at not home. Still want to use your pool even though the weather is cooler today than expected? Simply go to the Smart Life App and increase the water temperature, no need to even be near your heat pump.

Key features

Wi-Fi

Wi-Fi module supplied as standard, comes with 10m extension cables for improved connectivity (can be easily removed) – requires iOS / Android ‘Smart Life’ App

Intelligent operation

Three preset modes; Powerful mode maintains high heat output for fastest heating, silent mode keeps heat pump below 55% heat output for quietest running, smart mode allows heat pump to use full range of heat output for maximum flexibility and efficiency

Simple connections

9kW and 12kW models come factory fitted with 2.8m mains cable and UK RCD plug suitable for outdoor 13A sockets

1.5 inch female threaded water connections, use the supplied unions for pressure pipe, or you can use optional threaded hose tails for connecting 32mm or 38mm hose

Flexible heating

Heats from 5°C to 40°C, can also be used for cooling

All season model works down to -15°C, automatic hot gas defrosting keeps heat pump working even in minus temperatures

Quality by design

Black ABS weather and corrosion resistant cabinet with covered LCD display

Large heat exchanger for increased efficiency in lower temperatures

High efficiency performance with advanced full DC inverter system that automatically controls the running speed of the compressor and the fan

Low noise airstream design for very quiet operation, average sound level 45 dB(A) at one metre

High quality Toshiba or Mitsubishi compressor (see individual specifications)

EEV (Electronic Expansion Valve) throttling technology adjusts the gas flow and increases COP by up to 20%

Spiral Titanium heat exchanger is 40% more efficient than standard titanium heat exchanger

R32 gas for environmentally friendly operation

Winter cover included as standard (keeps debris out of unit when not in use)

Designed with Koi owners in mind

Heats from 5°C to 40°C

1°C differential to restart (differential below 1°C can affect efficiency)

Factory fitted mains cable on 9kW and 12kW plugs directly into 13A outside socket

10m extension cable on Wi-Fi module for improved connectivity to home Wi-Fi networks (removable if not needed)

Inverter model is suitable for all year round heating / cooling

Large heat exchanger for improved efficiency at lower temperatures

Remote input for external thermostat with probe

name: Elecro Cygnet EVO2 1kW Digital Heater (All Titanium)
description_text:
A fully titanium heater by Elecro, the Evolution 2, is the latest and upgraded version of the original Evolution. Boasting 100% efficiency, safety, and above all, reliability, this compact and robust unit will effortlessly heat your pool or spa to your desired temperature.

Features & Benefits

  • Ten power options ranging from 1-kW to 24-kW
  • Easy installation, fully equipped and pre-wired
  • Robust, durable construction
  • Ultra-reliable ﬂow switch allows safe operation
  • Temperature thermostat and overheating sensor
  • Compact, durable design
  • Analogue control with 1.2˚C differential or digital control with 0.5˚C differential and selectable multi-lingual display
  • Titanium ﬂow tube and titanium heating element
  • Can be ﬂoor or vertically wall mounted
  • Vortex, long life, stay clean heating element technology
  • 100% efﬁciency throughout the product life
  • Silent operation

Technical Data

Power Supply

Single phase or three phase
Flow Requirements

Minimum flow: 1-kW to 6-kW, 1m³/h
Minimum flow: 9-kW to 24-kW, 4m³/h
Maximum flow: 17m³/h
Heating Elements

Grade 1 titanium
Flow Tube

Grade 1 titanium
Control Thermostat

Analogoue: 0>45°C (1.2°C differential)
Digital: 0 > 45°C (0.5°C differential)
Safety Thermal Cut Out

60°C (manual reset)
Flow Switch

Gold tipped reed switch with titanium fulcrum pin
Contactor

Siemens 3RT2023 OR 3RT2027
Seals

High temperature special formula EPDM ferrules, TPE end fitting gaskets
Water Connection

1.5” BSP female thread supplied with 1½” / 50mm stepped ABS unions for rigid pipe and 1½” / 1¼” stepped hose tails for flexible pipe
Ingress Protection Rating

IP44
Frequency

50/60 Hz
Working Pressure

4 bar maximum
Mounting

Floor or wall mounting

name: Large TITANIUM Submersible Heat Exchanger (22mm) 30kW
description_text:
The heat exchangers are designed for full immersion in water. In addition to stainless steel heat exchangers. The heat exchangers are available in 2 models: for a heat transfer of approximately 15 kW and 30 kW respectively (with a temperature difference of approximately 50°C).

Titanium Heat Exchangers: Saltwater Applications

  • exceptional corrosion resistance: titanium is highly suitable for saltwater environments due to its high resistance to corrosion
  • longer lifespan: thanks to the durability of titanium, these heat exchangers have a longer lifespan, especially in (aggressive) saltwater conditions
  • efficient heat transfer: just like our stainless steel models, these heat exchangers offer efficient heat transfer

name: Small TITANIUM Submersible Heat Exchanger (12mm) 15kW
description_text:
The heat exchangers are designed for full immersion in water. In addition to stainless steel heat exchangers. The heat exchangers are available in 2 models: for a heat transfer of approximately 15 kW and 30 kW respectively (with a temperature difference of approximately 50°C).

Titanium Heat Exchangers: Saltwater Applications

  • exceptional corrosion resistance: titanium is highly suitable for saltwater environments due to its high resistance to corrosion
  • longer lifespan: thanks to the durability of titanium, these heat exchangers have a longer lifespan, especially in (aggressive) saltwater conditions
  • efficient heat transfer: just like our stainless steel models, these heat exchangers offer efficient heat transfer

name: Remora Proffesional 35 Inverter heat pump (with Wi-Fi)
description_text:
Everything about the Remora Professional says quality, whether it’s the performance, the engineering or the controls – put it all together and you’ve got a heat pump that looks every bit as good as it performs.

Our unique partnership with the manufacturer of our Remora heat pumps allows us to deliver the performance and features our customers want, the result is a range of heat pumps that deliver exceptional COP and heating efficiency, the Remora Professional Inverter range introduces our first 14kW plug and play model and a new 35kW model at the top of the range.

Matching the Remora Professional’s performance, are the highest levels of British quality control and engineering, the powder coated steel case features a cut out fan grill adding to the already sleek and stylish design, the patented, flush fit touch control LCD screen is fully waterproof and requires no additional cover, the full colour display offers precise digital read outs and the heat pump is controllable via Wi-Fi using Smart Life App.

The build quality of the Remora Professional is backed by a four year parts and labour warranty and a ten year warranty of the compressor and heat exchanger (parts only after year four).

The Remora Professional features external control (subject to connection to a suitable Wi-Fi network), allowing remote access to the heat pump for changing parameters and diagnosing running issues, this removes the need for an engineer to attend site or for customers to self-diagnose issues, advanced parameters allow for all aspect of the heat pumps running to be tailored to your requirements.

The full stepless DC Inverter system allows the Remora Professional to be responsive and efficient, choose Boost mode to deliver fast heating, Silent mode for night time running, Eco for the most efficient running or simply leave in Smart mode for intelligent day to day heating or cooling of your pool or pond, all selectable at the touch of a button.

Our 8kW, 10kW and 14kW Remora Professional heat pumps come fitted with mains cable, RCD and plug as standard, making them suitable for outdoor sockets, the other models in the range will require electrical installation by a qualified electrician.

Key features

Four year parts and labour warranty and ten years on compressor and heat exchanger (parts only after year four)

Wi-Fi connectivity built-in – requires iOS / Android ‘Smart Life’ App (requires Wi-Fi network with suitable signal strength)

Preset modes; Boost mode maintains high heat output for fastest heating, Silent mode for night time running, Eco mode for most efficient running and the intelligent Smart mode for maximum flexibility

User-friendly high end touch screen controller, flush fitting colour LCD – watch video

High quality matt finish powder coated galvanised steel casing with integral fan outlet and heat exchanger inlets

8kW, 10kW and 14kW models come fitted with 2.8m mains cable and UK RCD plug

Power usage log shows how much energy has been consumed in each running mode

Advanced Parameters for full control of heat pump settings, running status and fault history

Automatic software update via internet (no need for engineer to callout to update)

External Control allows remote access to diagnostics and parameters for resolving setup issues and potential fault finding

Timer operation and secondary Silent mode timer, ideal for night time running

Heats and cools, set temperature selectable from 5°C to 40°C

Extended season model works down to -15°C, automatic hot gas defrosting

1½ inch / 50mm female glue socket water connections

High efficiency performance with advanced stepless DC inverter system that automatically controls the running speed of the compressor and the fan

Low noise airstream design for very quiet operation, average sound level <30 dB(A) at 10 metres

Stepless twin rotary inverter compressor and DC brushless fan motor

EEV throttling technology adjusts the gas flow and increases COP by up to 20%

Spiral Titanium heat exchanger is 40% more efficient than standard titanium heat exchanger

R32 gas for environmentally friendly operation

Winter cover included (excluding Professional 35)

Remora Professionals are ideally suited to Koi ponds

Wide range of set points from 5°C to 40°C (according to application)

1°C differential to restart

13A RCD plug on 8kW, 10kW and 14kW models allows you to plug units directly into outside sockets without need for additional electrical connections

Inverter model is suitable for all year round heating / cooling

Remote input for external third party thermostatic management

name: Remora i-27 Inverter Heat pump (with Wi-Fi)
description_text:
If you are looking for a premium quality heat pump for your pool or Koi pond, with intelligent controls that will maximise heat output and minimise energy consumption and the added benefit of a three year parts and labour warranty for your peace of mind, then look no further than the Remora Inverter.

The Remora Inverter has been designed to be fully responsive to your pool or ponds heating, or cooling needs, Powerful mode delivers the fastest heating, Silent mode offers quiet overnight running and Smart mode automatically and efficiently maintains your desired water temperature.

Electrical connection is easy with the 9kW and 12kW Remora Inverter heat pumps as they come pre-fitted with a mains cable, RCD and plug, making them suitable for use in 13A outdoor sockets, the rest of the Remora Inverter range requires installation by a qualified electrician.

Wi-Fi connectivity comes as standard, meaning you can control your Remora Inverter heat pump from your smart device, even when you are at not home. Still want to use your pool even though the weather is cooler today than expected? Simply go to the Smart Life App and increase the water temperature, no need to even be near your heat pump.

Key features

Wi-Fi

Wi-Fi module supplied as standard, comes with 10m extension cables for improved connectivity (can be easily removed) – requires iOS / Android ‘Smart Life’ App

Intelligent operation

Three preset modes; Powerful mode maintains high heat output for fastest heating, silent mode keeps heat pump below 55% heat output for quietest running, smart mode allows heat pump to use full range of heat output for maximum flexibility and efficiency

Simple connections

9kW and 12kW models come factory fitted with 2.8m mains cable and UK RCD plug suitable for outdoor 13A sockets

1.5 inch female threaded water connections, use the supplied unions for pressure pipe, or you can use optional threaded hose tails for connecting 32mm or 38mm hose

Flexible heating

Heats from 5°C to 40°C, can also be used for cooling

All season model works down to -15°C, automatic hot gas defrosting keeps heat pump working even in minus temperatures

Quality by design

Black ABS weather and corrosion resistant cabinet with covered LCD display

Large heat exchanger for increased efficiency in lower temperatures

High efficiency performance with advanced full DC inverter system that automatically controls the running speed of the compressor and the fan

Low noise airstream design for very quiet operation, average sound level 45 dB(A) at one metre

High quality Toshiba or Mitsubishi compressor (see individual specifications)

EEV (Electronic Expansion Valve) throttling technology adjusts the gas flow and increases COP by up to 20%

Spiral Titanium heat exchanger is 40% more efficient than standard titanium heat exchanger

R32 gas for environmentally friendly operation

Winter cover included as standard (keeps debris out of unit when not in use)

Designed with Koi owners in mind

Heats from 5°C to 40°C

1°C differential to restart (differential below 1°C can affect efficiency)

Factory fitted mains cable on 9kW and 12kW plugs directly into 13A outside socket

10m extension cable on Wi-Fi module for improved connectivity to home Wi-Fi networks (removable if not needed)

Inverter model is suitable for all year round heating / cooling

Large heat exchanger for improved efficiency at lower temperatures

Remote input for external thermostat with probe

name: EVO 55w UVC
description_text:
The Evolution Aqua evoUV deliver a more efficient and more economical performance than before thanks to their new design.

The new range includes completely redesigned 30 Watt and 55 Watt models and a 110 UV, a 15 Watt and 25 Watt model perfect for use on the smaller garden pond, along with a 75 Watt version. The new range of evoUV pond clarifiers have been manufactured to deliver optimum performance at all times.

evoUVs have been designed to clear green water, which is caused by single celled green algae, and prevent it from returning.

  • IP Rating of IPX5
  • Easy to maintain, easy to install
  • Ballast located in a fully water-tight cover
  • Connects to flexi-hose or rigid pipework
  • 6 models; 15W, 25W, 30W, 55W, 75W & 110W
  • Eradicates green water in garden ponds 
  • Features highly efficient ballasts

name: Filtreau 40w amalgam Replacement Lamp
description_text:
Introducing the Filtreau 40W Amalgam Replacement Lamp - the perfect solution for ensuring clean and healthy water in your filtration systems. As a trusted wholesaler, we are thrilled to offer you this top-of-the-line replacement lamp designed to enhance the performance of your water purification equipment.

The Filtreau 40W Amalgam Replacement Lamp is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, utilizing cutting-edge technology and high-quality materials. This lamp is specifically designed to provide reliable and efficient UV-C sterilization, effectively eliminating harmful bacteria, viruses, and other microorganisms that may contaminate your pond water.

Installation is quick and hassle-free, allowing you to seamlessly replace your existing lamp without any complicated procedures.

name: Amalgam 40W Submersible UVC (3 Piece)
description_text:
These lamps can be used in filter tanks so the water can pass without any resistance/pressure loss

NOTE: the UV-C Radiation range is limited (dependent on i.e. the water clarity) so only a part of the flowing water is treated. The user is responsible for the dangers of exposure to the UV-C radiation to the eye.

Use the supplied safety glasses and/or a safety switch that automatically switches the lamp off when you have access to the lamp.

WARNING: Please make sure that the lamp is always completely underwater!

 

The plastic end of the lamp has a 32mm diameter so you can use 32mm pipe clips to mount the lamp in the tank. The T5 lamp has a 9000 hour lifespan and a 25000 microwatt output. A special tank connector is now available for direct installation in i.e filters.

name: Yamitsu 55W
description_text:
Yamitsu algae master uv‚‚¾‚s are made from
UV stabilised materials to ensure a longer
life and incorporate turbulators to enhance
the unit‚‚¾‚s performance. Large inlet and
exhaust ports make the algae master uv
suitable for a wide range of pond uv
applications. It is recommended that the
algae master uv should be installed using
solid solvent weld pipe.
All algae master uv‚‚¾‚s come complete with
(glue in) hosetails enabling them to be
connected to ½‚‚½, ¾‚‚½, 1‚‚½, 1¼‚‚½ and 1½‚‚½
flexible pipe. Algae master uv‚‚¾‚s will also fit
most popular 1½‚‚½ household solvent weld
waste and pressure pipes.
Algae Master Pond UV Installation-
If you have a severe algae problem you
should effect a partial water change before starting the
installation. Yamitsu Algae Master Pond UV can be added
to any existing filtration system. For best results algae
master units should be fitted in line, after the pump, with
water being forced through them. Use the largest size
of pipe possible. If hosetails are to be used, it is very
important that they are trimmed to the largest possible
size that will fit inside the flexible pipe (before glueing in
place). This will ensure that the maximum flow rate can
be obtained for the size of pipe.

description_text:
Yamitsu algae master uv's are made from  UV stabilised materials to ensure a longer
life and incorporate turbulators to enhance the unit's performance. Large inlet and
exhaust ports make the algae master uv suitable for a wide range of pond uv
applications. It is recommended that the algae master uv should be installed using
solid solvent weld pipe.

Algae Master Pond UV Installation-
If you have a severe algae problem you should effect a partial water change before starting the installation. Yamitsu Algae Master Pond UV can be added to any existing filtration system. For best results algae master units should be fitted in line, after the pump, with
water being forced through them. Use the largest size of pipe possible. If hosetails are to be used, it is very important that they are trimmed to the largest possible size that will fit inside the flexible pipe (before glueing in place). This will ensure that the maximum flow rate can be obtained for the size of pipe.

name: EVO Titanium 110W UVC
description_text:
EVO Titanium 110w UVC

Evolution Aqua evoUV Ti, Titanium Enhanced UV Clarifier is up to 1.5 times more effective than a standard UV Unit. The evoUV Ti is made using the latest photocatalytic technology and is lined with a thick and polished titanium tube, to clear green pond water fast. 

Key Features

  • Clears green water fast - Up to 1.5x more effective than a standard UV.
  • Photocatalytic technology - Improves clarity by neutralising algae, bacteria and viruses.
  • High output, energy efficient ballast - Housed in a fully serviceable control box.

How it works?

Evolution Aqua evoUV Ti, Titanium Enhanced UV Clarifiers are made using the latest technology and are lined with a thick and polished titanium tube, to clear green pond water fast. When the UV light strikes the internal surface of the titanium chamber it produces an instant photocatalytic reaction and generates Hydroxyl Radicals, a powerful oxidant, that instantly destroys organic and inorganic matters, neutralising water-born algae, bacteria and viruses resulting in clearer water whilst being perfectly safe for all pond life.  

The overall dimensions of evo110 Ti are 990mm (l) x 195mm (w) x 280mm (h). The distance between the centre of the inlet and the centre of the outlet is 768.5mm. The evo110 Ti uses two standard length 55W T8 UV bulbs.

Submersble UV-C lamps have a big advantage compared to
conventional UV-C units: no pressure loss!
These lamps can be used in filter tanks so the water can pass
without any resistance/pressure loss.

by is treated. The user himself is responsible for the dangers of exposure to UV-C radiation to the eyes! Use the
supplied safety glasses and/or a safety switch that automatically switches the lamp off when you have access to
the lamp.
Warning: Please be sure the lamp is always completely under water!
